.<div type="canto" n="7" xml:id="krsnayana_01.08">
.
555<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.08.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">ndan devi pr̥thukīrtti duhkhita viraṅrvaṅ sūksək agə̄ṅ* lara,</l>
.<l n="b">āpan kr̥ṣṇa sireki mantva karəsəp maṅgəh katən iṅ manah,</l>
.<l n="c">śrī cedi pva kasiddha māyu riṅ apan tan kepvane tyasnira,</l>
.<l n="d">kadyambəkniṅ uməntas iṅ lvah-udadhi yat riṅ vvat lavan tambaṅan.</l>
560 <!-- <app>*B. A. śukasək gə̄ṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.08.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">onək maṅən-aṅən manahnira tan ekatvā mahurhūrakən,</l>
565<l n="b">bhaktyāsvāmi sirāvədī vidhi paniṅkah bhismakendradhipa,</l>
.<l n="c">piṅ rvā pin tiga piṅ* limā valuyikaṅ jñānā mulik pālapan,</l>
.<l n="d">saṅ prajñeṅ amaṅun viveka niyatekin byakta tan gyāgyana.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. pi.</app> -->
.</lg>
570
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.08.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">ṅhiṅ saṅ kr̥ṣṇa jugeki tan hana vaneh mantvānuṅ ayogyana,</l>
.<l n="b">lāvan ken vara rukmiṇī hana iraṅhyun rakva rīndranuja,</l>
.<l n="c">hetu śrī pr̥thukīrtti buddhinira tuṅ-taṅ pakṣapāte* hati,</l>
575<l n="d">himpər paglaran vicāra katiliṅ giṅgaṅ kagəṅan sivil.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. pakṣavāte.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.08.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">yeka potusan aharəp* ḍatəṅa ri kr̥ṣṇendra māṅundaṅa,</l>
580<l n="b">meh ni kārya vivāha kāraṇa nirān motus vvaṅ aṅgyakna,</l>
.<l n="c">vvantən saṅ katuduh kapārccaya vidagdha strī susatyabrata,</l>
.<l n="d">acārārəcəp uttameṅ abhinayā taṅgvan vruh iṅ lokika.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. harə.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>B. Lontar 14 ends here, followed by lontar 13.</app> -->
585 <!-- <app>b. B. meh niṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.08.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">eñjiṅ rakva linakva-lakvakən adan maṅkat bhaviṣyā larinikā,</l>
.<l n="b">rājye dvaravati* jugekaṅ inusīnya lampa[h] apadgata,</l>
590<l n="c">śīghrā prāpta piraṅ kuləm ḍatəṅ i pāda śrī surendrānuja,</l>
.<l n="d">ri śūnyān makāladeśa** humatur somyāṅucap sādara.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. Daravati.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. mukāladeśa.</app> -->
.</lg>
595<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.08.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">śrī devī pr̥thukīrtti motus i patik saṅ natha maṅken ḍatəṅa*,</l>
.<l n="b">glānāṅga** kataman viyoga kasəkan duhka riṅ adhyatmika,</l>
.<l n="c">ndan sa-pəṅundaṅ***nikaṅ larānakira putrī ken rarā rukmiṇī****,</l>
.<l n="d">siddhātəmva lavan sunīti kadahut de bhīṣmakāmidhyani.</l>
600 <!-- <app>*B. A. maṅ cen dhati.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. AB glānāga.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***S. A. sa-pəṅunda. B. sa-məṅunda.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>****S. AB. rukminā.</app> -->
.</lg>
605<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.08.07" n="7">
.<l n="a">sojar bhīṣmaka nora laṅghana tuvin saṅ rukma maṅraṅkəpi,</l>
.<l n="b">tan vandhyā marikā təkaṅ saji sayogyaniṅ vivāhakrama,</l>
.<l n="c">lavān cedi taman vuruṅ ḍatəṅa tan mithyān mareṅ kuṇḍina,</l>
.<l n="d">vastra mvaṅ kanakādi ratna rumuhun salvirnikaṅ tumbasan.</l>
610</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.08.08" n="8">
.<l n="a">nāhan hetu patik narendra humatur maṅundaṅa,</l>
.<l n="b">apan Ivirnira reṇa saṅ nr̥pati norāṅhiṅ narāryyāsrayan,</l>
.<l n="c">tovin saṅ rara śokāśāṅajap* akiṅkiṅ marmma ḍatəṅa** haji,</l>
615<l n="d">vr̥ttāṅde kajanapriyān karaṇaniṅ kotus təkaṅgyakna.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 13 ends here, followed by lontar 16.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. AB. marmma . . . haji.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.08.09" n="9">
620<l n="a">nāntən si rara yogya kahyunana vetniṅ rūpa tan popama,</l>
.<l n="b">rəs rāgāṅdadi harṣa māvak aśarīra strī kajanmānira,</l>
.<l n="c">śr̥ṅgārāṅavatara kiṅkiṅ inadhiṣṭhanātəmah putrikā,</l>
.<l n="d">antukniṅ mamutər* tasik madhu madadyan mānuṣāṅiṇḍarat.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. mamurtti.</app> -->
625</lg>
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.08.10" n="10">
.<l n="a">sāsiṅ kāryanirāmaṅun priyaniṅ ambək kveh kapūhan mulat,</l>
.<l n="b">sāśrī yan humənəṅ təkāsih aṅucap yan pojarāṅəne hati,</l>
630<l n="c">yapvan deva yayān araśmi ṅuniveh yan cumbu-cumbvararas,</l>
.<l n="d">somyāliṅgih arājasāṅlih aṅadəg apantəs vagəd yan laku.</l>
.</lg>
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.08.11" n="11">
635<l n="a">pəmpə̄nan haripiṅ pisaṅ halas ikaṅ netrā manis yan liriṅ*,</l>
.<l n="b">kəmkə̄man maṅuneṅ galuh gəluṅ irīn vāhvādyus amvās mure,</l>
.<l n="c">rehniṅ karṇa kadīnukir halis iruṅ lambe paḍāṅambvakən,</l>
.<l n="d">riṅ rahyāmatu caṇḍanīnasah aniṅkamniṅ kace kesuhan.</l>
. <!-- <app>pisaṅ halas: wild banana (plant). It might be that halas should be read halis (eyebrow). So the phrase should read halis nikaṅ netra (the eyebrows of the eyes), but I cannot be sure.</app> -->
640 <!-- <app>*B. A. yon liri. rahy āmatu caṇḍani.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>G &amp; R 1.247 explains that vatu candana (N) or sela candani (K) is the name of a very fine vhite stone, also said of marble (naam van een zeer fijne vitte steen, ook voor marmer). In Javanese the phrase or expression bathuke nyela cendhani means a very beautiful forehead, vhite and smooth. For the Javanese, a white face meaning fair complexion, is beautiful, as in general the skin of the Javanese people is of a darker tint.</app> -->
.</lg>
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.08.12" n="12">
645<l n="a">siṅgih mitra təmən siraṅ nr̥patiputrī deni rūmniṅ taman,</l>
.<l n="b">vruh solur tali luṅgahiṅ gaḍuṅ aket lāvan ləməsniṅ təṅah,</l>
.<l n="c">rāmyātūt sahatur papak susu*nira mvaṅ raśminiṅ nyuh gaḍiṅ**,</l>
.<l n="d">ambəkniṅ luṅayan mapaṅ*** silih ave mvaṅ polahiṅ pāda****-pa.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB putu.</app> -->
650 <!-- <app>**B. A. nyah gajiṅ.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. A. mapar.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>****B. Lontar 16 ends here, followed by lontar 15.</app> -->
.</lg>
.
655<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.08.13" n="13">
.<l n="a">śrīniṅ kesara sə̄k animpənakən iṅ kumbaṅ kalaṅvān ira,</l>
.<l n="b">lakṣmini parikarma pətta pinəpəs riṅ varṇa ratnadrava,</l>
.<l n="c">yan lālitya laleda maṅliriṅakən tiṅhal tuməṅheṅ rəmə̄,</l>
.<l n="d">lvir mə̄rāhavan indracāpa maluyāmore kətər* iṅ pate*r.</l>
660 <!-- <app>*S. AB. kətən.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="8" xml:id="krsnayana_01.09">
.
665<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.09.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">siṅgih yañ cakravarttye rūpa vadana* nirānopamottuṅgadevī,</l>
.<l n="b">ekachattreṅ karaśmin pinakasuluhiṅ arəṅga rumniṅ tapəl** mās,</l>
.<l n="c">sahityā pun-punan sarvasalaga sahana nyātibhaktyātalaṅkup,</l>
.<l n="d">mūr aṅdoh hyaṅ ratih tan pamaḍani rarasiṅ rūpa ken rājaputrī.</l>
670 <!-- <app>*S. AB. nahana.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. kamal mās.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.09.02" n="2">
675<l n="a">ndug vālānvam savaṅ pādapa paṅavakira reh pahat ketakārjja,</l>
.<l n="b">vāhvaṅgatgat dhīh* ānan təṅahira binəbəd marma piṅgət siniṅsət,</l>
.<l n="c">lāgyājambət ginəgvan pinalu-palu humis luh nirādrəs saranti**,</l>
.<l n="d">maṅgar mātyān tumiṅhal kadi hiniris ikaṅ nāla***niṅ tvas kapīṅrəs.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. dhīk.</app> -->
680 <!-- <app>**S. AB. paranti.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. A. kāla.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.09.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">himper taraṅgaṇembuh rarasira vinilaṅ saṅśayākveh matambəh,</l>
685<l n="b">tandhyan ndah varṇa vintaṅ vuluku halis irāraśminiṅ krut maveh kuṅ*,</l>
.<l n="c">lvir taṅguṅ an vruh dikṣa** narapatiduhitā kalaniṅ māsasāndhya,</l>
.<l n="d">ndan aṅhiṅ se buṅahniṅ mukha sinama-sameṅ kāraniṅ candravimba.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. ku.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. an...rudī karana.</app> -->
690 <!-- <app>ndan aṅhiṅ se buṅahniṅ kuka (then her shining countenance can only be compared....). The word se is perhaps only an exclamation word like si in East Java or sometimes sèh in Central Java, though I also suspect that sèh may come from the Dutch word zeg. It has no special meaning at all, and it is recorded in G &amp; R. I.735 II, as a demonstrative word.</app> -->
.</lg>
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.09.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">ri ṅrəs-ṅrəsniṅ vuluh danta tuvuhira tan orāṅaras riṅ ka*-vaṅsan,</l>
695<l n="b">trus tuñjuṅ riṅ karaśmin manisira saləmah mvaṅ gagana jamus ya,</l>
.<l n="c">milvāñandī vuṅusiṅ maśarīra siki śuddhālayon** nāgapuṣpa,</l>
.<l n="d">mambə̄*** rumniṅ gaḍuṅ campaka surabhi sapuṇḍuhniṅ aśoka sinvam****</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 15 ends here, followed by lontar 18.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. śuddhālayo.</app> -->
700 <!-- <app>***B. A. pāmbāruṅ.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>****B. A. ākoka sanvam.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.
705<div type="canto" n="9" xml:id="krsnayana_01.10">
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.10.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">eñjiṅ mavəvehan i rūm ri huvus irāhyas makin* arəjāhyaṅ,</l>
.<l n="b">sākṣat səkar asanābhrā** salaga sinaṅliṅniṅ aruṇa tuməraṅ***,</l>
710<l n="c">kesis vətisira kadyāṅrəsa**** kaharas kosap i təpiniṅ ken,</l>
.<l n="d">marmāragət ika matrāsmu puḍak anvam kagarit i ronya*****.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. makan.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. asanācrā.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. A. tumtəri.</app> -->
715 <!-- <app>****B. A. kadyāṅrəca.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>*****B^ A kagarit i nonya..</app> -->
.</lg>
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.10.02" n="2">
720<l n="a">sampun mavida-vidādan maṅaveśa* icchāmiru-miru** siñjaṅ,</l>
.<l n="b">harṣānahaja sumaṇḍiṅ riṅ iña maraṅ rājasa maṅisapvan,</l>
.<l n="c">keṅis trivalinirāṅrās arəja lukar mambət ika kinəmban,</l>
.<l n="d">səṅsəṅ amirahare kavurini tapak ***niṅ tali-tali korut.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. maṅasya...</app> -->
725 <!-- <app>**B. A. icchāmiru...</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. A. ni kapat.</app> -->
.</lg>
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.10.03" n="3">
730<l n="a">tistis vvay ahaləp aśri masidəhañaṅgī təher aṅuḍoda,</l>
.<l n="b">ləṅləṅ kadi hana kaṅə̄n i hati kakasih* pinakapajātyan,</l>
.<l n="c">luhyān paṭik**-aṭikan sparśana kuṅ i simsimnira lagi keṅsə̄r,</l>
.<l n="d">somyāṅusapi muyuṅniṅ susu lagi korut rakət i limut*** nya****.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. ta kasih.</app> -->
735 <!-- <app>**B. A. padik.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***S. AB. lumut.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>****B. A. lumut...</app> -->
.</lg>
.
740<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.10.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">tan ry aməṅan iṅ alupālə̄k* maguliṅan iṅ pādapa śayanālūm,</l>
.<l n="b">marme ṅ ana(k)-anakan yan panuru-nurū lā**-gi*** milu katurvan,</l>
.<l n="c">vahvāṅlilir aṅusap bāhu karakətan sari sarasijāmrik****,</l>
.<l n="d">hīsniṅ hariṅet i***** gulvaṅani jajārjjāñjalajahi****** santən*******</l>
745 <!-- <app>*B. A. alupāṅduk.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 18 ends here, followed by lontar 17.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***S. AB. lagə.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>****B. A. sirasijāmrik.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>*****B. A. ikar.</app> -->
750 <!-- <app>******g A.jajə̄rjjālajahi.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>*******B. A. santan.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>hīsniṅ hariṅət i gulv aṅani jajārjjañjalajahi santən. Zoetmulder records ani as meaning ants. If it is true, then the phrase should be translated into the flow of [her] sweat on her neck was like ants swarming on her breasts. However I think, that in this case aṅani means to cut, to hurt, to hit, to flow on, to fall on etc. Hence my translation.</app> -->
.</lg>
.
755<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.10.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">romāvrat apusi kosək kadi mina hāṅimbihi raras sinvam*,</l>
.<l n="b">more makusuta səṅsə̄m**ira halaṅə̄ Ivir suṅutiṅ aśoka,</l>
.<l n="c">olur hana karakət muṅgviṅ pipinirāvrā kadi megha,</l>
.<l n="d">sākṣat pasəsəhaniṅ cāmpaka manəḍeṅ tañjuṅ i vuhəlanya.</l>
760 <!-- <app>*S. AB. raras i nvam.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>kadi mina haṅimbihi raras sinvam. Perhaps if we read hāṅimbihi into hāṅimbəhi, it will make more sense. The vowelmarks of i (vulu) and ə (pəpət) are very similar especially in Balinese script. In Javanese script the difference is only in size, the pəpət being much bigger than the wulu. If we reads hāṅimbəhi, the rendering should be: the hairlocks on her temples look like fishes, increasing [her] beauty.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. matəmu suta səṅsə̄m. c. B. muṅgvi.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
765
.<div type="canto" n="10" xml:id="krsnayana_01.11">
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.11.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">sotan yan aləṅə̄ṅ i manis həniṅiṅ amrəta gula-gulaniṅ vvay iṅ pucaṅ*,</l>
770<l n="b">kadyāvətva juruh sirat-sirat i soṅkab (h)i vacana** nirāniram hati,</l>
.<l n="c">lvir maṅgistarəmək rəṅat-rəṅat ikaṅ laṭi binibik inuṅkad i vaja***,</l>
.<l n="d">maṅgəh tuhva makəmva-kemva madhu piṇḍani pipi niran aṅhəmu guyu.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. gula-gulaniṅ...</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. vacaka.</app> -->
775 <!-- <app>***B. A. i jaja.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.11.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">ndin devi kadi rūpa rājaduhitāləyəp inaṅən-aṅən rinūpakā,</l>
.<l n="b">lvir mukṣye ryy akiṅ əṇḍəp-əṇḍəp i hiḍəpniṅ umulat i səḍəṅ nirāṅure,</l>
780<l n="c">ṅkāne nūṣa mapaṇḍanāṅjrah* irikā ta sira kadi katəmvaṅləṅləṅa,</l>
.<l n="d">pantəs ta kapaṅgiheṅ paraṅ arəs mijil ahavana** saṅhubiṅ bāñu.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. aṅjuh.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. ahavuda.</app> -->
.</lg>
785<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.11.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">yan sore* kalaṅə̄niran təlasiṅ ahyas ahavu-havu rājas āṅlara,</l>
.<l n="b">tan sah riṅ ləpihan prakī**-rṇa*** hinamər vinaca-vaca tinuṅku-tuṅkulan,</l>
.<l n="c">tapvan vis ya**** dahat riṅ akṣara tuhun hana riva-rivaniṅ vicakṣaṇa,</l>
.<l n="d">ndan aṅhiṅ kakavin paṅajyanira rakva tama pinakasəṅgu-seṅguhan.</l>
790 <!-- <app>*B. A. same.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. Lontar 17 ends here, followed by lontar 20.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. A. prakīṇa.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>****S AB. pisya.</app> -->
.</lg>
795<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.11.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">ndah sampun tucapən ta saṅ marək aneka saṅ akahulunan riṅ jronira,</l>
.<l n="b">strīni rəkyan aparicāra kapva paḍa bhakti sahananika riṅ nr̥pātmajā,</l>
.<l n="c">ācārī kili len karaṇḍanira yāṅkən anuha-nuhane suputrikā,</l>
.<l n="d">vuṅkuk vvalu* kadi riṅ tulis hana bule vujil añar** ulihiṅ manumbuki.</l>
800 <!-- <app>b. B. parināma.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. vval.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. abur.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.11.05" n="5">
805<l n="a">vvantən kāsihira vvaṅ adyah* araras valu-valu añar aṅgəgə̄ brata,</l>
.<l n="b">ndan parṇṇah vinidhin vənaṅ gumaməle** sira vəka-vəka rāja vallabha,</l>
.<l n="c">saṅ Ivīr bāpa kaluṅsuran*** ri sira siñjaṅ arəja sinalampurañ jamaṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">eñjuh rakva ṅaran**** sakeṅ guru katiṅgal iron aharəp iṅ pasəṅgahan.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. adyan.</app> -->
810 <!-- <app>**B. A. gumam de.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***S. A. kalaṅsarad ri. B. caṅ... kalaṅsaran ri.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>****S. AB. rukva ṅaran.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.11.06" n="6">
815<l n="a">lāvan teñanirāhatəp hana paśesani hayunira kapva tan hilaṅ,</l>
.<l n="b">lvir nyū danta sumāt* huvus təḍuh** ikaṅ susu gəluṅan irāsəlat huvan,</l>
.<l n="c">aron-ron katapaṅ ləvas tuvuhirārəja yayan aṅanī tvas iṅ umulat,</l>
.<l n="d">marmāmbəkniṅ anon i raśmini raras-rarasira kadi paṅlvaṅi vulan.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. suvāt.</app> -->
820 <!-- <app>**B. A. təḍah.</app> -->
.</lg>
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.11.07" n="7">
.<l n="a">yan bvat rājya ri kuṇḍina vvaṅ arəjān paṅucapa siddhāṅayat halis,</l>
825<l n="b">pahyas dvara*-vati jugaṅ tumiru sāmbək ulah-ulah i leka rājasan,</l>
.<l n="c">aṅjrah taṅ mahaṅan dudū ṅ** kakuraṅan guyu sinipat ikeṅ*** ujar pisan,</l>
.<l n="d">kapva**** hū-huran advitiya paḍa tāsir-asiran avədi n kasorana.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 20 ends here, followed by lontar 19.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. dudū n.</app> -->
830 <!-- <app>***B. A. ikenujar.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>****S. AB. sapvā-</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.11.08" n="8">
.<l n="a">strī ri jro nagari kuṇḍina tan ora vinuvus ika rakva len vaneh,</l>
835<l n="b">rājya dvaravatī kalaṅvan ika revataka vukir agə̄ṅ pacaṅkraman,</l>
.<l n="c">tovin saṅ sinivi prabhūttama kavi prajurit atiśayāñjanapriya,</l>
.<l n="d">nahan liṅ nyan umastutī haji nəhər mucap i hayu ṅ anāma rukmiṇī</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.11.09" n="9">
840<l n="a">apan tan hana kaprakāśa naranatha juga pinuji kastavenaləm,</l>
.<l n="b">lumreṅ rāt kajanānurāgani bapaṅku ratu taruṇa vīra vīryavan,</l>
.<l n="c">nāhan ta kāraṇa rukmiṇī tvasnira hənti kapulut i lulutnire haji,</l>
.<l n="d">kāryāvaknira rāga-rāga lara kuṅ smara pinakatali hyuniṅ hati.</l>
.</lg>
845<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.11.10" n="10">
.<l n="a">ndah vvantən paricarikānira pinarṇṇah atuha-tuha riṅ pagundikan,</l>
.<l n="b">ndātan sah ri sirāmarah-marah i gāta vacana paribhāṣa* saṅskr̥ta,</l>
.<l n="c">vvaṅ-vvaṅ rājya tətes titik nagara kavvaṅannika pinakesiniṅ purī,</l>
.<l n="d">vruh-vruh ry ambəkaniṅ tuhan rəsəp aśabda saphala tumusə̄n pasaṅjīvan.</l>
850 <!-- <app>*B. A. parikana.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.11.11" n="11">
.<l n="a">yekā cintya panūkṣma*niṅ rasa rahasya** sakinəñəpire daləm hati,</l>
.<l n="b">tovin vvaṅ kr̥ta*** satya nityasa tamolah i sira saphalān kaparcaya,</l>
855<l n="c">kiṅkiṅ**** rāganire bapaṅku laki nora vihikana muvah pinivruhan,</l>
.<l n="d">aṅhiṅ lot amaṅun vilāpa pinucaṅ-pucaṅ***** anulis i gātraniṅnikā.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. punūkṣma.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. Lontar 19 ends here, followed by lontar 22.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***S. A. vakr̥ta. B. vvakr̥ta.</app> -->
860 <!-- <app>****B. A. kiṅki.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>*****B. A. pinucaṅ punaṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.
865<div type="canto" n="11" xml:id="krsnayana_01.12">
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.12.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">maṅke ṅvaṅ* mucape lulut ire nr̥pati rahina rātri riṅ-rāṅəsah**,</l>
.<l n="b">kadyānurvani ketakāmbəkira yan paguliṅan irikaṅ tilām śinayanan,</l>
870<l n="c">tan śobhān paməḍar bəbəd gəgət agātra vuri-vurinikaṅ tapih linukaran,</l>
.<l n="d">glānāṅlih mapəpət-pəpət ləṅəṅ avarṇa kusuma pinarantyan iṅ kupu-kupu.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. ṅva.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. riṅ-raṅəsah.</app> -->
.</lg>
875<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.12.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">marmma ṅvaṅ ri sirān kagə̄ṅan ariṅ aranəhi linaran* iṅ smarāmarupuhi,</l>
.<l n="b">sakvehniṅ kusumeṅ taman paḍa sumaṅgraha pinarəkakən tan ora karəsəp,</l>
.<l n="c">ambvāmbvan mulat iṅ gaḍuṅ miṅay aṅambuṅ asanāsmuniṅ** manah laṅu-laṅun,</l>
.<l n="d">ṅhiṅ tañjuṅ hinarasnirenaṅit-aṅit lagi pinakarakət-rakət ri taliṅa.</l>
880 <!-- <app>*B. A. lanaran.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. ni.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.12.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">maṅkin saṅśaya kuṅ nirāṅidani tan kavaśa vətuniṅ luhnirān paṅarape,</l>
885<l n="b">tan ryy ameṅan panaṅis-naṅis gumuyu ləṅəṅ aṅiduṅ asameni bhāsa kakavin,</l>
.<l n="c">aṅəmban kucupiṅ* puḍak pinakarovaṅiṅ aṅucap-ucap kinon sumahura,</l>
.<l n="d">kumbaṅ mə̄r i**-nave pininta kasihan riṅ apa ya vənaṅājar aṅanumana***.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. kacupiṅ.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. Lontar 22 ends here, followed by lontar 2l.</app> -->
890 <!-- <app>***S. AB. ajar-ajar umana.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.12.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">māryyānambəhi pahyas endah amayu ṅ cəcə*-cəcək i ratan ləbu karahinan*,</l>
.<l n="b">seṅsə̄niṅ laṭi meh suməmyak asaraṅ** kasiharəp inatīta tan kininaṅan,</l>
895<l n="c">tan pendah turahiṅ limut pupur irārarab i tīniḍa puccha tan karahupan,</l>
.<l n="d">matra Ivir vulan ardha*** moləm asamun səmuni kalani śesaniṅ laṭi-laṭi****.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. śahinan.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. asaran.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***S AB. adva.</app> -->
900 <!-- <app>****B. A. laṭi-laṭa.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="12" xml:id="krsnayana_01.13">
.
905<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.13.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">saṅsiptāni lulutnira huniṅan,</l>
.<l n="b">gə̄ṅ karuṇya narendra tumulusa,</l>
.<l n="c">lāvan teki muvah vavarəṅə̄hən,</l>
.<l n="d">pāṅundaṅnira reṇa saṅ ahulun.</l>
910</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.13.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">nda tan səṅgahən aṅlalari gave,</l>
.<l n="b">liṅ devī pr̥thukīrtti parikədə̄,</l>
.<l n="c">atyantāmbəkire ḍatəṅa haji,</l>
915<l n="d">maṅke rakva təkā tan akaḍata.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.13.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">kāla kṣepa taman gavayakna,</l>
.<l n="b">yan ri dharma danārjjana carita,</l>
920<l n="c">tiṅkahniṅ gati tan kalavasana,</l>
.<l n="d">kanyādānaha den kasuvayana.</l>
. <!-- <app>kāla kṣepa taman gavayakna (The time is short, do not [delay to] act.). Z. I.771 kālakṣepa a vaste of time; to vaist time: Wir. 51.30 usəna ta lumakva hayva kalakṣepa. SS. 275.4 pəṅpə̄ṅən ikaṅ hurip, hayva kalakṣepa. My translation seems to have support from the quotations above.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.13.04" n="4">
925<l n="a">yapvan prāpta ri kuṇḍina nagarī,</l>
.<l n="b">ken putrī tumuluy hañāṅakna,</l>
.<l n="c">nirvighnaṅ sukarā gari nr̥pati,</l>
.<l n="d">ndā tan māntyakna ṅ madhu sinahir.</l>
.</lg>
930<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.13.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">apan tiṅkah ikaṅ ulah ahañāṅ,</l>
.<l n="b">hayvānut i subhāgama divasa,</l>
.<l n="c">rāgāpakrama yekana* gavayən,</l>
.<l n="d">ṅkā gandharvavivāha ṅaran ikā.</l>
935 <!-- <app>*B. A. yeka.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.13.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">nāhan pājar-ajarnikaṅ utu*-san,</l>
.<l n="b">prajñālūṅ i kalaṅvan inucapan,</l>
940<l n="c">rehniṅ nāva kapantəsan iṅ ujar,</l>
.<l n="d">tiṅhal sābhinayāmiresəpakən.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 21 ends here, followed by lontar 24.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.13.07" n="7">
945<l n="a">ndan śrīndranuja harṣaja ruməṅə̄,</l>
.<l n="b">marmma tvasnira tan vavaṅ asahur,</l>
.<l n="c">kadyolug səmuniṅ manah akəteg,</l>
.<l n="d">himpə*r salah* ulahniraṅavaśa.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. solah-ulah.</app> -->
950</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.13.08" n="8">
.<l n="a">somyārum kamənāniraṅucapa,</l>
.<l n="b">lambe sāmpun inaṅkas inusapan*,</l>
.<l n="c">taṅkupni jarijīnənah i jaja,</l>
955<l n="d">śabda Ivir asirat-sirata maṇik.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. inucapan.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.13.09" n="9">
.<l n="a">kṣantabyākna saṅhulun i kita,</l>
960<l n="b">hayvājambat ikaṅ vacana pahe,</l>
.<l n="c">vyarthākvehnikaṅ amrəta* humilī,</l>
.<l n="d">yadyan mātra yayāmuhara sukha.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. amrə...</app> -->
.</lg>
965<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.13.10" n="10">
.<l n="a">śabdantārddha kanyəṅkaṅan avanəh,</l>
.<l n="b">jambudvīpana deniṅ aṅucapa,</l>
.<l n="c">ndi ṅvaṅ tan harəpe ṅ rara rahayu,</l>
.<l n="d">jātīkaṅ taruṇāhyune taruṇī.</l>
970</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.13.11" n="11">
.<l n="a">maṅken prāpta ḍatəṅ kita lumavad*,</l>
.<l n="b">lvir varṣādrəs anīsi kayu ragas,</l>
.<l n="c">kiṅkin iṅvaṅ aluṅgah aṅalayan,</l>
975<l n="d">vahvāron lara kuṅ masəkar unəṅ.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. lumavan.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.13.12" n="12">
.<l n="a">tiṅkahniṅ kumudāṅajap i vulan,</l>
980<l n="b">byak teṅ utpala * harṣa riṅ aruṇa**,</l>
.<l n="c">rəm-rəm hapti rikaṅ gati ṅ asana,</l>
.<l n="d">vuṅvāṅjrah niyatanya kagərəhan.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. utphalu.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. araṇa.</app> -->
985</lg>
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.13.13" n="13">
.<l n="a">nda tan sah taṅ bhramarāṅaraṅ i səkar,</l>
.<l n="b">kuntul mə̄r layatāṅlaya ri pasir,</l>
990<l n="c">mrāk prāyān tumiliṅ-tiliṅ i patər,</l>
.<l n="d">kālaṅkyaṅ bhramitāṅusir i rəməṅ.</l>
. <!-- <app>d. B. utsahā bhramarāṅusir.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.13.14" n="14">
995<l n="a">tādvā*-t maṅkana ta ṅhulun alaṅə̄**,</l>
.<l n="b">maṅkvekiṅ*** turidāgya ṅ abayaṅan,</l>
.<l n="c">rāgāṅambhara tan papagaməlan,</l>
.<l n="d">mukseṅ kuṇḍina tan pa... pāmutan.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 24 ends here, followed by lontar 23.</app> -->
1000 <!-- <app>**B. A. aṅalaṅə̄.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. A. madvekiṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.13.15" n="15">
.<l n="a">sambega pr̥thukīrtti riṅ agati,</l>
1005<l n="b">sākṣat sītakārār avas i pətəṅ*,</l>
.<l n="c">səṅsə̄ṅ** nyeṅ aruṇān vavaṅ umijil,</l>
.<l n="d">ṅvaṅ darppa*** narimānaḍah**** asiha.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. pitaka gāravas i pətə.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. pəṅpə̄ṅ.</app> -->
1010 <!-- <app>***B. A. ḍampār.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>****S. AB. nari manaḍahasiha.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.13.16" n="16">
.<l n="a">āmbək rukmiṇī harṣaja riṅ akuṅ,</l>
1015<l n="b">himpər mas inapīnamər i* hati,</l>
.<l n="c">yāṅkən pathyanikaṅ vuvus amanis,</l>
.<l n="d">karuṇya pr̥thukīrtti** panəpuha.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. inapīnaməra.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. AB. pr̥thukirtta.</app> -->
1020</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="13" xml:id="krsnayana_01.14">
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.14.01" n="1">
1025<l n="a">Iti maṅkanojar ira kr̥ṣṇa təlas ahuvusan sirāvuvus,</l>
.<l n="b">alaṅə̄ kagəntəran unəṅ* sabhaya kagərəhan raras hati,</l>
.<l n="c">mapa ṅgəgəs karərəṅan** turida yaya tinampvan iṅ lulut,</l>
.<l n="d">mahudan-hudan smara harəp marəka ri haṅətiṅ payodhara.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. kagənti ranu niṅ.</app> -->
1030 <!-- <app>**B. A. karərəṅan.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.14.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">hana sot irān tulus atəmva saha rasa lavan suputrikā,</l>
.<l n="b">ragasāṅgaliṅ-galiṅa ros i təṅahiṅ anukər sinaṅhulun,</l>
1035<l n="c">caru rahni siñjaṅiṅ arūm sumaji saha savur-savur pupur*,</l>
.<l n="d">vuhəliṅ gəluṅ mahululan lukarana kaharan kupat ləpas.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. savur-savur ...pur.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>kupat ləpas. A kupat or ketupat in Indonesian is cooked rice in a palm-leaf packet. The form of a kupat ləpas or kupat luwar in Javanese is not square or diamond like, but rather elongated, and I feel, most fitting to describe the form of a hairknot coming loose. On Lebaran days, the Javanese use to send kupat luwar with the appropriate side dishes to friends and relatives to express the wish to be freed from all misconduct in the past year. Luwar signifies free.</app> -->
.</lg>
1040<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.14.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">irika sirāṅaṅən-aṅən ryy ulahaniṅ umarā ri kuṇḍina,</l>
.<l n="b">aharəp sirānilib atañjalavur alicināṅgiri hyaṅa,</l>
.<l n="c">kavulāṅiriṅ rva təlu pa*-t mamava pamucaṅan lavan karas,</l>
.<l n="d">aṅalap ta yolih-ulihan magiba-gibah avidva-vidvana.</l>
1045 <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 23 ends here, followed by lontar 26.</app> -->
.
.<note>magiba-gibah avidva-vidvana. Z. 1.523 is doubtful in his rendering of the word gibah as ’a kind of shawl or wrap’, perhaps influenced by J which has kleed? I think, it does not fit in our context. Therefore I regard the word gibah as a possible variety of gubah (to compose garlands) and translate the phrase accordingly.</note>
.
.
1050</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.14.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">sipi rāmyaniṅ kavi kakuṅ hana ri para-paranya ṅ kaləṅə̄ṅ,</l>
.<l n="b">pituvi pvā yāmənaṅi kārya məgi-məgila ri yaśāsənət,</l>
.<l n="c">kalaṅə̄nya yan parananiṅ jaruman aləsāvaluy-valuy,</l>
1055<l n="d">akirim sipat bhuratarūm saha sisig inamər lavan sərəh.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.14.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">suvalən ri sinvamiṅ* aśoka tulisan aparab salaṅsaṅən,</l>
.<l n="b">rarasiṅ sabuk cavəli raṇḍi pamalun aṭik** arja vuṅkusən,</l>
1060<l n="c">ləpihan pamuṣṭi pənədən panamayaniṅ anūkṣma miṅgata,</l>
.<l n="d">samarən tayeṅ viru-viruni tapihiṅ utusan*** təkākna.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. sanvamiṅ.</app> -->
. <!--aparab salaṅsaṅan. Perhaps it should be read aparab salaṅsaṅən. Z. II.1614 renders salaṅsaṅ (derived from saṅsaṅ) with ’to hang something, whilst J. translate it as ’music instrument’. I translate salaṅsaṅən as ’to be attached’.-->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. apik.</app> -->
1065 <!-- <app>***B. A. tapihi vukusan.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.14.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">vara rukmiṇī pva kahanan rasiki ləvəs atīta durggama,</l>
.<l n="b">ri* daləm puri putusiṅ iṅgita bhaya kadi siṅha gahvara,</l>
1070<l n="c">tuvi saṅ kakāṅəmit inimbuhan** i piṅit irārya bhiṣmakā,</l>
.<l n="d">alabuh smarānala juga ḍatəṅa mapa ta deya lampunən.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. ra.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. inimbuhak i.</app> -->
.</lg>
1075<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.14.07" n="7">
.<l n="a">nr̥pa cedi maṅgadha* təmən pratiniyata nikin<!--error for nikiṅ?--> panambhava,</l>
.<l n="b">kalavan vrəhādrəthasutā** pituvi musuhateki pūrvaka,</l>
.<l n="c">ya ta hetuniṅ harəp arakṣaka saha bala vīra maṅkata,</l>
.<l n="d">yan apāṅ asaṅgraha tan ora halani pavara***-hniṅāgama.</l>
1080 <!-- <app>*S. A. cedikārggadha. B. cedi nāṅgadha.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. prahrādradhasutā.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. Lontar 26 ends here, followed by lontar 25.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
1085
.<div type="canto" n="14" xml:id="krsnayana_01.15">
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.15.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">nahan hiṅanirāviveka tucapa ṅ divakara sumirəp samaṅkana,</l>
1090<l n="b">tis-tis taṅ divasā luṅa tumūta ṅ* ḍaḍali mider alivəran iṅ tavaṅ,</l>
.<l n="c">meghar iṅgitaniṅ dukilyan atətəl tumahi vəsi** gumopurāruhur,</l>
.<l n="d">ṅkane śr̥ṅganikāsinaṅ kəñariṅ arkka hana kari satejaniṅ damar.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. tu...ukaṅ.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. tumahi iṅsi.</app> -->
1095</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.15.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">sə̄b-sə̄b ratri humuṅ tikaṅ nagara ghurṇṇita mavurahan iṅ vaṅ iṅ kuṭa,</l>
.<l n="b">sāmpun rakva ghinopitān sahananiṅ maṅiriṅa sakatambeñjiṅa,</l>
.<l n="c">nāhan hetuniṅ aṅkas-aṅkas asənāha kavaca śara cāpa vāhana,</l>
1100<l n="d">vvaṅ sa-dvāravatīnatag tinuduhan madadakan apatan hinə̄makən.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.15.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">nāntən saṅ yadu-vrəṣṇi saṅ marək arəp vruha juga vinarah rikaṅ naya,</l>
.<l n="b">lavan śrī baladeva mukhya sira rovaṅiṅ aṅulih-ulih pinivruhan,</l>
1105<l n="c">rvekaṅ nīta ṅaranya hayva juga taṅgula* vəlit i hivəhnya tolihən,</l>
.<l n="d">yāvāt ṅ vaṅ maviveka tan dadi vijigīṣu** tivas ika*** ya tan parovaṅa.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. A. tan gula vəlit. B. tan gula vələt.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S, A. vijigīpu. B. jijigīsu.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. A. ita ya.</app> -->
1110</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.15.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">ndā prāpta ṅ vəṅi sūrya vāhu sumurup śaśadhara gumavaṅ magantaran,</l>
.<l n="b">ton taṅ bapra binajralepa sumənə̄ makin apətak aṅambvakən laṅə̄,</l>
.<l n="c">mayāniṅ kayu ca*-marākara-kararəja rumahab aṅəbi gopura,</l>
1115<l n="d">rāmyālivəran ikaṅ kunaṅ-kunaṅ avarṇa latu-latuni tejaniṅ vulan.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 25 ends here, followed by lontar 28.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.15.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">tis-tis māsa samaṅkanā nr̥pati leṅleṅ aṅaraṅ irikaṅ pasaṅgrahan,</l>
1120<l n="b">paṅlilān ginave-gave paṅalusan pamiḍuḍukan akaṇṭa kāvakan,</l>
.<l n="c">saṇḍiṅ yarəja tīrtha rāmya tinatāṅ sphaṭika vatu putihnya tut sisi,</l>
.<l n="d">lyab deni maṇi candrakanta* kumicir mina karana laṅə̄ pinañcuran.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. candrakkanka.</app> -->
.</lg>
1125<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.15.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">ṅkane piṅgir ikaṅ gr̥hātulis mās vraja sinavuṅ i tejaniṅ damar,</l>
.<l n="b">mrik māmbə̄ təkap vitiṅ* gaḍuṅ pinakariṅ-riṅ aṅaraman arambatan tətə̄,</l>
.<l n="c">yeka rakva pāran iraṅ nr̥pati mār gatinira rumaras harəp-harəp,</l>
.<l n="d">kaḍyāvarṇa katəmva saṅ katuridan maṅlih aguliṅan aməḍar tapih.</l>
1130 <!-- <app>*B. A. təka vit. d. B. aguliṅāməḍar.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.15.07" n="7">
.<l n="a">kiṅkiṅ śrī naranatha tan palipuran sakamatan amaṅun raras hati,</l>
.<l n="b">kəlabniṅ sinvam anundul iṅ hati mavarṇa taṅaniṅ aṅave kumon mara,</l>
1135<l n="c">aṅde kuṅ svaraniṅ cəcək baṅun avaṅsitana mayani muṅgaheṅ jinəm,</l>
.<l n="d">ābhāniṅ lalavān krəbətnika sasiñjaṅiṅ anilib* arəs kataṅyana.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. anilab.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.15.08" n="8">
1140<l n="a">sarvāṅde turidālaṅə̄ kiris ikaṅ* kusuma surabhi śāri kāṅinan,</l>
.<l n="b">himpər mās kinikir hanan kadi burat haṅət i panəpi kosap** iṅ tapih,</l>
.<l n="c">tan pendah*** paṅucal**** maṇik titis ikaṅ həbun aṅayati hisnya meh tibā,</l>
.<l n="d">lvir kampit maparas-paras vvahiṅ aśoka suməlat i səkarnikāpənəd.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. A. ika. B. ikiṅ.</app> -->
1145 <!-- <app>**B. A. kocap.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. Lontar 28 ends here, followed by lontar 27.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>****B. A. paṅudal.</app> -->
.</lg>
.
1150<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.15.09" n="9">
.<l n="a">tovin karttika māsa mātra rarabiṅ garigisan ira maṅlavad-lavad,</l>
.<l n="b">tan māməṅa kuduni* vuṅu vahu kumumbu savaṅ asih amarəṅā gərəh,</l>
.<l n="c">kadyātis maririṅ kucupniṅ asanāṅgəgəs amupusi ronya kāṅinan,</l>
.<l n="d">aṅde harṣa səkarnikaṅ mənur anīs** aṅariṅ-ariṅ i tejaniṅ vulan.</l>
1155 <!-- <app>*B. A. na</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. adīs.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>aṅde harṣa səkarnikaṅ mənur anīs aṅariṅ-ariṅ i tejaniṅ vulan (the jasmines gave rise to delight as they enjoyed themselves in the cold rays of the moon). Z.I.127 aṅariṅ-ariṅ to rest; at ease; to feel comfortable; to feel at home; calm; to enjoy oneself. The jasmines seem to flower at first in the early hours of dawn. It can stay fresh for several days, if not picked up to be spread on the bed.</app> -->
.</lg>
.
1160<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.15.10" n="10">
.<l n="a">luṅhāṅ ratri tatas ləvəs kalusa kayvan ikaṅ upavanākəmul hīma,</l>
.<l n="b">tuñjuṅ nyeṅ talagāmrəmāṅləyəp umaṅgut amarəṅi paṅobnikaṅ havan*,</l>
.<l n="c">ndān aṅhiṅ kamalantiṅanya kumətər sumilih** atilik antih-antihan,</l>
.<l n="d">nirvākvehni pusuhnikaṅ rara kamālvan arah apatikān paḍāturu.</l>
1165 <!-- <app>*S. A. paṅobnikaṅ... B. paṅobnikaṅ hivan.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. sumilah.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>ndān aṅhiṅ kamalantiṅanya kumətər sumilih atilik antih-antihan. Z. I.783 explains that kamalantiṅan becomes kemandliṅan in Modern Javanese and gives as meaning ’a kind of big tree-spider’. The meaning above is not fitting and I think the word kamalantiṅan in the text might be derived from kamala (lotus) and antiṅ (to sway to and fro) and -an (suffix). Antih accordiṅ to G &amp; R. I.22 is the name of small flying insects with six long and fine legs. I render antih here with ’bee’ because in the RK.II.4 there is a similar description, which reads as follows:
. byaktan katon dilahniṅ apuy ya molah,
. kumbaṅ bhramanta i ruhurnya aṅkən kukusnya.
1170 (Clearly they looked like moving flames and the bumblebees upon them [lotuses] were like smoke).</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.
.<div type="canto" n="15" xml:id="krsnayana_01.16">
1175<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.16.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">praptekaṅ* rahināva sāmpun arahup śrīndrānujācāmana**,</l>
.<l n="b">ṅkāne sārah-arah bhaṭara śīva sūryāyoga sānismr̥ti,</l>
.<l n="c">oləm iṅalirān sunvan*** aruṇa Ivir tuñjuṅ eñjiṅ məkar,</l>
.<l n="d">hūṅ-hūṅniṅ pranavastutīnamər-amər**** Ivir śabdaniṅ ṣaṭpada.</l>
1180 <!-- <app>*B. A. prapteṅ kaṅ.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. śrīndrānujādharmana.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***S. AB. tasunvan.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>****S. AB. prabhavastutīnamər-amər.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>bhaṭara śīva sūryāyoga sānismr̥ti oləm iṅalirān ta sunvan aruṇa lvir tuñjuṅ məkar (Facing eastward [the direction of the sun] he engaged himself in prayers in the remembrance of God Śiwa. From gloom he was brightened by the rays of the morning sun, like the day-lotus opening up in the morning. He enshrined the sound of the syllable Om which rang like the buzzing of the bee, in his heart). The phrase ta sunvan should be read kasunvan. It is believed that whenever a person trapped in sorrow or confusion by wordly problems, remembers God Śiwa in meditation, he will be freed from perplexion and receive the realization of the self as a soul, playing its role in the drama of the world. By this realization he is freed from worry and his countenance is bright again.</app> -->
1185</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.16.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">teg kumva* ṅ ghaṭikāpisan manitikaṅ rojeh** akon maṅkata,</l>
.<l n="b">osik śabdanikaṅ mr̥dāṅga gumuruh śaṅka svarāsaṅghani,</l>
.<l n="c">praptekaṅ pakudan makon rumu***[-hun umaṅkatārampak aglis****],</l>
1190<l n="d">[mojar sārathi nyār]*****-jja tāruh-aruhan tekaṅ surak ghūrṇita.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. cumva.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. rojoh.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. Lontar 27 ends here, followed by lontar 30.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>****S. AB. rumu...</app> -->
1195 <!-- <app>*****S. AB....jja.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.16.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">ryyaṅkatni bala saṅka riṅ kuṭa matanḍəg səsək riṅ havan,</l>
.<l n="b">rāmyārāmpak ahūr-huran vahu suməṅkāryambalaṅ gopura,</l>
1200<l n="c">śabda nyāsahuran paḍāsraṅ aṅucap magyan vruheṅ kuṇḍina,</l>
.<l n="d">[mojar ta yeṅ mukhāvya kəneṅ ga]lah* śabdanya hayvākabət.</l>
. <!-- <app>a. B. matanḍeg sək səsək.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>*S. AB...lah śabdanya etc.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>mojar ta yeṅ mukhyāyva kəneṅ galah śabdanya havyākabət. Z.I.759 akabət useless; ineffectual; of no avail; slow; tardy; casual. No entry from K.Y. All the meanings given above seem not to fit here, and as there is no entry from the K.Y., it may be assumed that they are not related to the K.Y. text. When I read this stanza, my mind went straight away to the wayang-show, especially the scene of the marching out of the army. Even in the text of the pakəm (handbook for the puppeteer) we still have this description, as follows: alon kanca, alon dhisik. iki ana apa dene lakuniṅ prajurit ṅarəp mandhəg, mburi ṅaṅsək, tumbake padha diconcoṅake iki? yèn ṅanti ṅənani rovaṅe ṅanti tivas, arak jənəṅ mati kodhok... kobètna ṅarəp, tak səsəkne mburi... (calm down, slow down a little, my friends. Why are the soldiers in front stopping, whilst those in the back are pressing forth with their lances pointing forward? If you hit your friend, and he dies, it will be called to die in vain... Make room in the front and I will squeese a bit in the back...). See Ki Siswoharsojo, Wahju Purba Sedjati, p.30-1. I render therefore the phrase above accordingly.</app> -->
1205</lg>
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.16.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">luṅhāṅdoh laku savatək yadu kabeh śūnya ṅ kadatvan ləṅə̄,</l>
.<l n="b">ṅhiṅ* karyāṅaraṅin garantuṅ i yavāṅantī vijil saṅ prabhu,</l>
1210<l n="c">nāntən sāmpun adan təlas mabasahan śrī natha meh maṅkata,</l>
.<l n="d">yātra ṅ ve śubhakāla lagna juga lakvāṅhiṅ kinerhernira.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. himpər.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>nāntən sāmpun adan təlas mabasahan śrī natha meh paṅkata.</app> -->
. <!--Z. I.221 basahan: lover garment (kampuh etc.)
1215 J. p.403 : staatsiekleed (robes of state).
. I think, J. is closer to the original meaning. In Javanese, the basahan is mostly used by kings and princes etc while in great ornate attire or going to battle. King Krəṣṇa at this state is going to Kuṇḍina to face both, a wedding ceremony which might turn into battle.-->
.
.
.
1220
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.16.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">sāmpun taṅ sakaṭāpasaṅ rva salayāpan pat kuda nyāmatək,</l>
.<l n="b">ndan rakveki ṅarannya sonya kalavan sugrīva sāre ratha,</l>
1225<l n="c">nda tan sor si valāha kadi turaga mvaṅ meghapuṣpenaləm*,</l>
.<l n="d">kocap riṅ giri durgga toya ṅuniveh yan riṅ təgal paparaṅan**.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. vuspenaləm.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. papuṅan.</app> -->
.</lg>
1230<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.16.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">tovin sarathi sāra pamrəg ira saṅ kr̥ṣṇāṅaran dāruki,</l>
.<l n="b">khyātiṅ rāt karəṅə̄ prakaśita vidagdhājar mahavāhana,</l>
.<l n="c">sikṣāṅ* śasananiṅ turaṅga kottama nyātyanta riṅ laghava,</l>
.<l n="d">yadyan priṅga hənu** pinurva pinurug nyāhyun riṅ utyādakā.</l>
1235 <!-- <app>*B. A. sikaraṅ.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. Lontar 30 ends here, followed by lontar 29.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>pinurug nyāhyun riṅ utyādakā. The meaning of the word utyādakā is very dark. Therefore I read it this way: pinurug nyāhyun (r) iṅutit udakā. Z. II.2151 renders utit as ’to swing back and forth’, whilst J has omdraaien (to swing around). So I come to translate it ’... then he turned around towards the sea’.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.16.07" n="7">
1240<l n="a">ndah yekā rumuhun* haneka sakatamvat** saprakārāyudha,</l>
.<l n="b">laṅkap hrū śivapatra*** leñ curiga colī candrahasakīla****,</l>
.<l n="c">cakrānāma sudarśanākiris alaṇḍəp Ivir kīla*****niṅ vulan,</l>
.<l n="d">śaṅkhānindita pañcajanya humaḍaṅ sāmpun kabeh saṅkəpan.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. muhun.</app> -->
1245 <!-- <app>**B. A. sakaṅamvat.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. A. śavapatra.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>****B. A. candrahasākāla.</app> -->

1250<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.16.08" n="8">
.<l n="a">muṅgah śrī naranātha riṅ ratha lavan saṅ maṅhavin pavvahan,</l>
.<l n="b">kintvīkaṅ katuduh marək dvijakulānvam nāma meghadhvaja,</l>
.<l n="c">vvaṅ-vvaṅ nagari kādhikara saphalān parṇṇahnikāmvaṅ-mvaṅa,</l>
.<l n="d">prajñeṅ jñana janapriya jñananipuṇa nā taṅgvan manah tan mada.</l>
1255</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.16.09" n="9">

.<l n="b">maṅən yyan*** kavulāṅiriṅ raras ikaṅ parṇṇah kinonkon ira****,</l>

1285<div type="canto" n="16" xml:id="krsnayana_01.17">
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.17.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">ləpas larinikaṅ rāthāməgat alas təga-təgal i samīpaniṅ pasir,</l>
.<l n="b">gəgə-gəgər i lor ikaṅ gunuṅ ri revataka suku-sukunya koṅkulan,</l>
1290<l n="c">narendra kamatolihən ri ləṅəṅ iṅ nagara makin adoh samar ləyəp,</l>
.<l n="d">takən(n)ya dinələ̄ nirārddha mahulap karaṇaniṅ atavəṅ-tavəṅ taṅan.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.17.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">sakāmbah amangun laṅə̄ gaga-gagā huvus iṅani daminyaniṅ hvaṅan,</l>
1295<l n="b">galəṅnika pəgat-pəgat savaləriṅ halis arəja kasiṅgahan pupur,</l>
.<l n="c">sarambut inurāraras vahu jumambakāla-alaṅ i lurahnya kaṅinan,</l>
.<l n="d">limut sumaput iṅ ruhur* kadi vəḍak sahaja ginuravākən iṅ susu.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. hunur.</app> -->
.</lg>
1300<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.17.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">pradeśa subhageṅ laṅə̄ havannirāpituvi janapadāparək pəkən,</l>
.<l n="b">kidulnika kadevagurvan ahələt juraṅ amarək i tīrtha pañcuran,</l>
.<l n="c">tahənya variṅin lanā panavaṅan priṅ ika katulajəg paṅavruhan,</l>
.<l n="d">śīlāpasaṅan pəpəd hana ri sornya pira-pira kunəṅ lavasnika**.</l>
1305 <!-- <app>*S. A. katulagər. B. katulagəṅ.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. Lontar 32 ends here.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.17.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">*hana vvaṅ irikaṅ bhagānjiṅ asigāmaca-maca milu tan sah iṅ tanah**,</l>
1310<l n="b">pilih pañarikan bataṅnya purugul-purugul abasahan vasəh radin***,</l>
.<l n="c">ləṅənyan makihal**** ya yan masidəhārasa kama luput iṅ jitākṣara,</l>
.<l n="d">mapaṅ salah alə̄***** mabaṅsi tāṅiduṅ****** titir apatəh mapan turuṅ tama*******.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 31 begins here.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. taḍah.</app> -->
1315 <!-- <app>***B. A. vasih radan.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>****B. A. makital.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>*****B. A. salab aṅənu.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>******B. A. taṅ maṅiduṅ.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>*******§ AB. tapa.</app> -->
1320 <!-- <app>asigāmaca-maca. Z.II.1760: asiga: elated; high spirited; boisterous; bold.
. J.p.618 : geveldadig; fier; triomfantelijk; zich sterk houden.
. The explanation of Z is more fitting here. I render it as ’reading aloud’. Perhaps the Javanese word is sigrak which means ’elated’ as well as ’keen’.
. bhagañjiṅ. Z.I.185 renders it as ’a kind of building (in the compound of a sanctuary?). Is it a place where books are kept and read’ The question mark reflects Zoetmulder’s doubt. I feel bhagañjiṅ should have some bearings with bhagavān (hermit), as añjiṅ in Javanese means ’to enter’ or literally ’to go into’ (daləm). Daləm can also mean residence, house. Hence I render bhagañjiṅ with hermitage.</app> -->
.
1325</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.17.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">katon ləbak ikaṅ vukir tasik anak savaṅ* i ranunikāryak aṅalun,</l>
.<l n="b">ləṅə̄ṅ ika pacaṅkramān iṅ umarādyusa madulur ahimya-himyana,</l>
.<l n="c">laṅə̄niṅ karaṅ-karaṅ kumuda rāmyaniṅ aṅusīra nūṣa rantunan**,</l>
1330<l n="d">ləyəp mahas alālanāhavan aramvanan ta (h)avəlah-vəlah taṅan.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. sasaṅ, c. B. iṅ akaraṅ-karaṅ.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. A. bhūsanan tunan. B. nuṣa rantunan.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.17.06" n="6">
1335<l n="a">ri duṅhus ika kahyaṅan həni-hənīriya pinakaləmahnya kāryakən*,</l>
.<l n="b">avarṇa pinarigyakən bāñāk ikājajar i** təpi padāṅrəpāturū,</l>
.<l n="c">maṅantiga ri nuṣaniṅ talaga len ikanaṅhət ri*** salvaṅiṅ karaṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">dudū taṅ anətəs katon sasəkariṅ kələpu makakurambaṅ**** iṅ bañu.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. kāryakan.</app> -->
1340 <!-- <app>**B. A. ri.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***S. AB. ikaṅhət i.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>****B. A. kakurambaṅ.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>sasəkariṅ kələpu. J.p.132 renders the word kələpu with naam van een boom (name of a tree). G&amp;R. I.498 is more explicit, namely kləpu devandaru is derived from Sanskrit kalpa devandaru. A tree does not fit in the context. So I think kələpu becomes kayu apu in Javanese, which according to G&amp;R. I.528 is a name of a river-weed Pistia Stratiotes L., that looks like floating green rosettes. It seems to be a striking description of the floating chicks with their greenish yellow plumage.</app> -->
.</lg>
1345<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.17.07" n="7">
.<l n="a">sirinya* ..........rbis paras,</l>
.<l n="b">ndan aṅhiṅ amavar juga ṅ katəmu len aṅasah-asah i vitnikaṅ vuṅū,</l>
.<l n="c">siluk-siluk ikaṅ juraṅ kabuyutan hana vulakan agə̄ṅ sakeṅ gihā,</l>
.<l n="d">arəs kadi liman muṅup vatu karaṅnya rəcəp atulale vvadiṅ tahən**.</l>
1350 <!-- <app>*B. A. siriṅnya...</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. Lontar 31 ends here, followed by lontar 34.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.17.08" n="8">
.<l n="a">[vvenika mahəniṅ saka ri ruhu]*-r acaracap atis** tahihyaṅən,</l>
1355<l n="b">pasir-pasir ikārəsik maṅalakā lakibi putər ika anucuk-nucuk,</l>
.<l n="c">karamyan ika rāmya paməṅ-aməṅan paduluran iṅ ameta paṅaga,</l>
.<l n="d">asumpiṅa pakis viriṅ nəhər amupvasusuh anusupeṅ kajar-kajar.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. ..........r acaracap.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. A. ..........r acaradak akis. B. ..........r acaracak atis.</app> -->
1360</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="17" xml:id="krsnayana_01.18">
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.18.01" n="1">
1365<l n="a">mintar tiṅhal irerikaṅ vatu* sumoṅ katə*mu-tinəmu ṅūnipājaran,</l>
.<l n="b">himpər ve tumibā sakeṅ tərətəpan manirati titisiṅ śilodaka,</l>
.<l n="c">ṅkane vəlkah ikaṅ paras kayu sənə̄nya tumuvuh asəvə̄** kadīhənə̄,</l>
.<l n="d">tə̄p hərtə̄p ḍaḍalinya mə̄r tumapa riṅ kasiratan akirig-kirig həlar.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. vətu.</app> -->
1370 <!-- <app>**B. A. asəpə̄.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.18.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">honyaṅ nyāsa tulīs karaṅ bhujaga ləṅ-ləṅ aṅililan arəs maniṅgilis,</l>
.<l n="b">kadyānəmburakən maṇik təkapiṅ erttali sumirat asə̄b* sumamburat,</l>
1375<l n="c">truhniṅ ve kumukus ri sinvamiṅ aśoka kuməlab akətər kadīnənə̄,</l>
.<l n="d">və̄rniṅ cātaka miṇḍuhur baṅun agañjurana riris anūt kuvuṅ-kuvuṅ.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. asəp.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.18.03" n="3">
1380<l n="a">ndan saṅ śrī basudevaputra lali deni kaləṅəṅan i rāmyaniṅ pasir,</l>
.<l n="b">laryyācaṅkrama lalanāmbək* ira tan vavarəṅə̄n irikaṅ prayojana,</l>
.<l n="c">saṅ meghadhvaja tan pramāda rasikāpitutur ajar aṅakṣamādara,</l>
.<l n="d">siṅgih yan gati sevakeṅ nr̥pati tan palə-paləh i karākṣa saṅ prabhu**.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. malad ambək.</app> -->
1385 <!-- <app>**B. Lontar 34 ends here.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="18" xml:id="krsnayana_01.19">
.
1390<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.19.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">*hiḍəpən iki vuvusni ṅvaṅ təkap saṅ narendra,</l>
.<l n="b">ta divasa yayi medan buddhi lam-lam salah tvan,</l>
.<l n="c">iṅət-iṅət i nathekaṅ karyya hayva pramāda,</l>
.<l n="d">tan ulahakna ṅ ambək lālanāgə̄ṅ halanya.</l>
1395 <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 33 begins here.</app> -->
. <note>I render salah tvan here as ‘to forget an important matter’, based on the view that salah tvan means ’to misjudge something, to calculate wrongly, to see something wrongly etc’. See Z. II.2028.</note>
.
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.19.02" n="2">
1400<l n="a">sagavayakna sādon hayva rakva madeya,</l>
.<l n="b">pira-pira bisaniṅ vaṅ yan makəmbā ləkasnya,</l>
.<l n="c">tivasa tuvi yan asvī byakta siddhā ṅ sinādhya,</l>
.<l n="d">ndya kari pinakevəh de saṅ āmbək sudhīra.</l>
. <!-- <app>d. B. karika.</app> -->
1405</lg>
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.19.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">tuvi marika kadohniṅ nāgarekaṅ parāna,</l>
.<l n="b">sira narapati cedin sugyan maṅke təkā ṅkā,</l>
1410<l n="c">kaparəpəkana meh kalānikaṅ rāja kārya,</l>
.<l n="d">sipi-sipi viraṅ iṅvaṅ duhkha yadyan kasepa.</l>
. <!-- <app>b. B. sugya maṅke.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.19.04" n="4">
1415<l n="a">puputiṅ ulah yekan* toliheə de narendra,</l>
.<l n="b">ri ḍatəṅa naranatheṅ kuṇḍinākveh bhayanya,</l>
.<l n="c">iveh [h]ana kita de śrī bhīṣmake don sabhārya,</l>
.<l n="d">ya ta hali-haliniṅ vaṅ lāgi kāṅən kamarmma.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. ayogan. d. B. ya kahali-hali.</app> -->
1420</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.19.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">Ivəhiṅ amuni nītīrin* tayeṅ cāra sūkṣma,</l>
.<l n="b">[kadi sumuṅ]kəma** mataṅ nyākon yan prayatna,</l>
.<l n="c">aha liṅana vikan vruh mogha mələtik prakāśa***,</l>
1425<l n="d">pravala juga pahə̄tənekaṅ**** sapolah saṅ natha.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. nin.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. AB. ...kəma.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. A. mo...lətik.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>****B. A. pabhitənəkaṅ.</app> -->
1430</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.19.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">vvaṅ* atəṅət akəkes mās kaṣṭa himpər daridra,</l>
.<l n="b">ndah apa ta karaṇa nyan kavruhan yan padrəvya,</l>
.<l n="c">papaḍanika** ryapāṅgapāṅhātakən*** hyun,</l>
1435<l n="d">asilurup i həniṅiṅ ve ndi tātan katona.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. vvara təṅət.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. Lontar 33 ends here, followed by lontar 36.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***S. A....paṅgapaṅhātaken. B. ........</app> -->
. <note>asilurup i həniṅiṅ ve ndi tātan katona? (Diving in clear water; why should he not be detected?) The Javanese equivalent for the phrase asilurup i həniṅiṅ ve is slulup iṅ banyu bəniṅ.</note>
1440
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.19.07" n="7">
.<l n="a">nr̥pati maparihārāṅlāvad iṅ vandhuvargga,</l>
.<l n="b">kramaniṅ asih asambhegāṅ rivəg riṅ svakārya,</l>
1445<l n="c">kahaləpan ika yogyā nyāvvata ṅ sopacāra,</l>
.<l n="d">arah ahala yadiṇ ḍatəṅ tan hinundaṅ.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.19.08" n="8">
.<l n="a">ndan i təka haji maṅke tan pakon bhīṣmakendra,</l>
1450<l n="b">təka kadi təkaniṅ vaṅ tuccha* sə̄manya janma,</l>
.<l n="c">mapi hivaṅ api puṅguṅ somyāsomyāpi mūdha,</l>
.<l n="d">kadi garuḍa vinikvan deniṅ aṅdani citta,</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. kunca.</app> -->
.</lg>
1455<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.19.09" n="9">
.<l n="a">narapatisuta rukmātyanta kocap vidagdha,</l>
.<l n="b">niyata juga tan aṅgəh byakta sarvvābisāṅgəh,</l>
.<l n="c">ṅuni-yuni mulat akveh nyaṅ vatək vrəṣṇi saṅgha,</l>
.<l n="d">saha gaja ratha vajī tiṅkahiṅ maṅkatāṅdon.</l>
1460</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.19.10" n="10">
.<l n="a">kaliṅan i vuvus iṅvaṅ hayva tan yatna-yatna,</l>
.<l n="b">tan alavasa narendrāṅusirekaṅ parāna,</l>
.<l n="c">rumuhuna kəta saṅke śrī mahārāja Cedi,</l>
1465<l n="d">duduga vayaha den āpan turuṅ siddhakārya.</l>
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="19" xml:id="krsnayana_01.20">
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.20.01" n="1">
1470<l n="a">lavan rakyan putrī bapa marika* hānāmbəkanira,</l>
.<l n="b">sarantāṅantyākən ri turunani sih sanmata haji,</l>
.<l n="c">katon ṅgyaniṅ buddyāpan alavas aṅə̄l rāga kinəñəp,</l>
.<l n="d">alal kadyāṅher-her** yu***-galaniṅ anaṅkəp manaḍaha.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. parika.</app> -->
1475 <!-- <app>**B. A. kadyāṅber...</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. Lontar 36 ends here, followed by lontar 35.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.20.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">iku(r) rāgābəṅkaṅ* pratuhu-tuhu yan rāja taruṇi&gt;</l>
1480<l n="b">olug tan kram riṅ rāsika kadi rare duryyaśa kavi,</l>
.<l n="c">tan āmbək iṅ vruh riṅ smara samaya śr̥ṅgara racana,</l>
.<l n="d">asiṅ mahyun yan sambhava mapa hala nyan lavanana*</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. rāgābəṅka.</app> -->
.
1485<note>smara samaya śr̥ṅgararacana (love, union and loveplay). Z. II.1 799 reads smarasamaya and renders it with intercourse in love or the right time for love? He translates śr̥ṅgara into ’1. love, sexual passion or desire or enjoyment; dress suitable for amorous purposes, elegant dress; 2. lovely; pretty; seductive’ (II.1816). On the other hand I regard śr̥ṅgararacana as a compound and render it with ornament (racana) of sexual passion (śr̥ṅgara), which in combination with smara and samaya (love and union) cannot be anything else than love-play.</note>
.</lg>
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.20.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">apan yaṅ vās-vāsən rarasiṅ anavuṅ kuṅ kadi sipī,</l>
1490<l n="b">laṅə̄niṅ vāhvānyumbana baśa-baśeṅ strī turuṅ anūt,</l>
.<l n="c">təgəlniṅ vahvāṅlih rəṅu-reṅu miṅe tan panahuri,</l>
.<l n="d">kətəgniṅ twas yan meh aṅuculana siñjaṅ kiniputan.</l>
.</lg>
.
1495<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.20.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">həli yan vahvāṅrabda turida tuhun tapvan anyuluh,</l>
.<l n="b">ni kol kosap kasniṅ susu kakuku mār-māri muririṅ,</l>
.<l n="c">misə-miṅsər maṅgā kinisapu sumāmbhyā anidəhani*,</l>
.<l n="d">viniṅka-viṅka kennika linukaran tan vavarəṅə̄n.</l>
1500 <!-- <app>*B. A. sumapbhyā...</app> -->
.</lg>
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.20.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">kunaṅ yan sāmpun mari viraṅiṅ apum* nora kataha,</l>
1505<l n="b">baṅun kuləpniṅ** ketaka paməkuliṅ vaṅ silihasih,</l>
.<l n="c">katon śīrṇa taṅ cāmpaka kahapitāṅanti ri jaja,</l>
.<l n="d">rapət siṅsətniṅ saṅgama rəsəp akarvan kətəg-kətəg.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. apup.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. AB. kuləpiṅniṅ. c. B. śīrṇahilaṅ cāmpaka...</app> -->
1510</lg>
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.20.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">nahan pājar meghadhvaja ri naranathāsmu* guyu,</l>
.<l n="b">vruha nyan paṅgyā-gyā ri ḍatəṅanireṅ kuṇḍinapura,</l>
1515<l n="c">mapa ṅ məṅgəp** ndah cittanira kapəgan koluran unəṅ***,</l>
.<l n="d">katon səṅ-soṅniṅ rāga kadi baləman mərāṅ mamaṅani.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. naranāthasma.</app> -->

. <!-- <app>***B. A. udiṅ. B. Lontar 35 ends here, followed by lontar 38.</app> -->
1520</lg>
.
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="20" xml:id="krsnayana_01.21">
.
1525<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.21.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">maṅkat śrī nātha saṅkeṅ girivana tumurun taṅ rathādrəs lakunya,</l>
.<l n="b">layvāṅuṅsi ryy ajuniṅ pasir ucapnikaṅ deśa sampun kalalvan,</l>
.<l n="c">māryyānuṅgaṅ sire rəṅga lumaris aḍarat deniṅ ambək viraṅvaṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">lāmpah tan kāvaran mār i duduga vaya paṅde*ni kiṅkiṅ nirāgyaṅ. </l>
1530 <!-- <app>*S. AB.pande.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.21.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">tut piṅgirniṅ tasik śūnya havan irātəṅə̄ durgamārəs laṅə̄nya,</l>
.<l n="b">lvah gə̄ṅ saṅkeṅ vukir vvenya kumutug amagut duṅhusiṅ sāgarāgroṅ,</l>
1535<l n="c">ṅek-ṅok śabdanya ri jro bañu baṅun uniniṅ haṅsa līlā maganti,</l>
.<l n="d">māryak-ryyak matri gañcākalaṅan akətəran kelu kedər limutnya*. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. maryyak-aryyak... limut.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.21.03" n="3">
1540<l n="a">nyu dantāpeki mulānya katəmu tumuvuh riṅ karaṅ tuṅga-tuṅgal,</l>
.<l n="b">sunde vitnyān kasūban hima kinusuk-kusuk ronya de nyāṅiniṅ ryyak,</l>
.<l n="c">kahyun-hyun vvad nikāvarṇa salisur aṅəḍəg vvahni maṅgar nyāməṇḍuh,</l>
.<l n="d">kuntul moruk laki-stryaṅiḍupuh* arərəban lāgi muṅgvī papahnya. </l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. laki-stryaṅiḍupuk.</app> -->
1545</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.21.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">duṅhus-duṅhus karaṅparvata ləyəp hur cāmarākveh kayunya,</l>
.<l n="b">vve saṅke agra maṅlandəṅ inavər iṅ aṅin sek svaranyāniram ryyak,</l>
.<l n="c">səb-sə̄b nyāvrāmaṅun truh* riris ahavuk avor vaṅkavān katraṅan ṅ ve,</l>
1550<l n="d">kat-kat luṅhā təkāṅanti tinub iṅ anilāṅhel umuṅsī paranya.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 38 ends here, followed by lontar 37.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.21.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">nyāsārəsəp pañcaraṅkaṅ kalasan* aparan ikaṅgā nya ṅūnīṅ uśana,</l>
1555<l n="b">caṇḍi nyātita meh-meh rubuha katuvuhan handul ajrah makəmbaṅ,</l>
.<l n="c">runtuh bapranya rag-rag lagi-lagi** katəkan vve dinuṅkapniṅ umbak,</l>
.<l n="d">arcca hyaṅ-hyaṅ nya rhṅkā kin&amp;mulan inavbr de ni paṅraṅkid***-iṅ vvad.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. A. paricaraṅkalasin. B. palicaraṅkalasan.</app> -->
. <!--<app><!-\-note for the reading-\-> candi nyUtita meh-meh rubuha (the gates had almost collapsed). This phrase is discussed in the introduction.</app> -\->-->
1560 <!-- <app>**B. A. laga-lagi.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***S. AB. paṅraṅkin.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.
1565<div type="canto" n="21" xml:id="krsnayana_01.22">
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.22.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">honyaṅ nūṣa gəgər-gəgər gunuṅ anak pavulatan i tahənya vaspada,</l>
.<l n="b">mrāk nyāsraṅ maṅuhuh lavan tuhu-tuhu svaranika karəṅə̄ sakiṅ pasir,</l>
1570<l n="c">ṅkāneṅ puñcak ikāṅ jəlag patani ləṅləṅ aṅililana* avarṇa riṅ tulis,</l>
.<l n="d">śuddhi Ivir kuduniṅ jamūr vahu məkar suhunan ika karambatan limut. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. aṅilil avan avarṇa.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.22.02" n="2">
1575<l n="a">tuṅhaniṅ paraṅ an ləṅə̄ ri surudiṅ vvay avuri-vuri tīraniṅ bañu,</l>
.<l n="b">rəcəp* Ivir minahenukir vatu karaṅnya kadi tiḍu** hanan baṅun ḍalaṅ,</l>
.<l n="c">ṅkane sor kalakā səkar taji kasaṅəla saha gagaraniṅ payuṅ rusāk,</l>
.<l n="d">layvan tuñjuṅ alūm avor vahəl aśoka kapipir apulaṅ lavan sərəh.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. arecep.</app> -->
1580 <!-- <app>**J. p.253 has tindu and renders it with geruish maken (making noise). Perhaps it is the Javanese word tidhur which according to G &amp; R. I.686 means het slaan van de bedhug (the beating/playing of the drum of the mosque). The term tidhur is especially used for the beating of the drum on the eave of the lebaran in Java. It seems that it has a longer history than I imagined before.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.22.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">piṅgirni jaladhī trəbis hana bhāgāñjiṅ* anəpi-nəpi śunya sāk ləvas,</l>
.<l n="b">runtuh śirṇa katimpal** iṅ bañu hatepnya kadi pinarapañca*** kaṅinan,</l>
1585<l n="c">marmma tvasniṅ anon rusākni vaṅunanyālayah akih umeh katumpəka,</l>
.<l n="d">odvad hetu nikāpagəh kavilət iṅ saka lumuṅ aṅayuh sakeṅ tahən.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. paṅgir...nāgāñjiṅ.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. AB. tatimpal.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***S. AB. pinaravəñca. B. Lontar 37 ends here, followed by lontar 40.</app> -->
1590</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.22.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">duṅhus Ivir minaharadin kadi sinapvan* arəsik arata həni riya,</l>
.<l n="b">paṇḍanyājrah arambatan kacacapan** təka ri paṅ ika vāhu karvaban***,</l>
.<l n="c">miṅgut-miṅgut ariṅguṅan baṅun ariṅgəkan inugah-ugah iṅ ampuhan,</l>
1595<l n="d">sə̄h rurvāṅalakeṅ puḍaknya tumibāṅ**** hrəbuk ika kasavur kadīnigū.</l>
. <!--<app><!-\-note for the reading-\->duṅhus (point; steep slope or face of rock; cliff; bank). See J.p.294, Z. I.433 and G &amp; R. I.606.</app>-->
. <!-- <app>*B. A. kadinapvan.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. kaḍaḍapan.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. A. karabvan.</app> -->
1600 <!-- <app>****B. A. tumivāṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.22.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">himper paṇḍita nirmmalālilaṅ ikaṅ tasik atahən arūm acaṇdana,</l>
.<l n="b">śaṅka mvaṅ trīpadāglar paḍa hane riya sumaji kijiṅnya pustaka,</l>
1605<l n="c">sāmpunyādyus ikaṅ gurundaya mareṅ karaṅ ahariṅ asūrya* sevana,</l>
.<l n="d">līlāgostikaṅ** kuyaṅ-kuyaṅ acamana parəṅ*** añavuk-ñavuk bañu.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. apūrya.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. AB. līlāgoca tikaṅ.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. A. rəṅ.</app> -->
1610 <!--<app><!-\-note for the reading-\->J. p.145 and G &amp; R. I.531 render kuyaṅ as ‘a kind of tree (Cassia Mimosoides)’ and Z. I.944 adds ‘or bird’. Both meanings do not fit here. So I think kuyang becomes the word keyoṅ (snail) in Javanese.</app> -->
.</lg>
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.22.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">lvīr aṅgə̄ṅ guṇa doṣa kuntul ika mə̄r* midər iṅ acala met saṅ aśrayan,</l>
1615<l n="b">kayvan vvadnya paḍāvilət sumləpit macili-cili susuhnikārusit,</l>
.<l n="c">tan sor** pakṣanikaṅ maniṅtiṅ arəbut makara silih-ukih lavan tilil,</l>
.<l n="d">buntək moha bisāṅalaṅ-halaṅi iṅ sakaraṇani vətəṅ***nya bəntəkan.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. mir.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>*B. A. taṅher.</app> -->
1620 <!-- <app>***B. A. vveṅnya.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.22.07" n="7">
.<l n="a">Arddha lon* lari saṅ narendra mulat iṅ saka**-matan amaṅun raras hati,</l>
.<l n="b">kəlab-kəlab***niṅ ryak avarṇa siñjaṅiṅ akuṅ manututi vilajāṅilayvana,</l>
1625<l n="c">mālad matra kilat nikārja kadi raṇḍi maṅavay**** iṅ akon arāryana,</l>
.<l n="d">prāptānis lariniṅ layar salakuniṅ vaṅ aləsu marākuḍuṅ-kuḍuṅ.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. len.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. Lontar 40 ends here, followed by lontar 39.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. A. təlab-tə*lab.</app> -->
1630 <!-- <app>****B. A. paṅavay.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.22.08" n="8">
.<l n="a">cət moghātutur iṅ vvaṅ adyah araras ṅ vaṅ umulat i kalaṅvaniṅ pasir,</l>
.<l n="b">kuntul mə̄r aniraṅ-niraṅ sajajar iṅ paradarākət i bāhu kesisan,</l>
1635<l n="c">paṇḍanyāsiḍəhālaṅə̄ sagigiriṅ karaṅ atapi-tapih limut mələk,</l>
.<l n="d">aṅde kuṅ rva puḍak məkar sakapasāṅ* kadi vətisiṅ anuṅgaṅ iṅ kuda. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. sakasāpāṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
1640
.<div type="canto" n="22" xml:id="krsnayana_01.23">
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.23.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">məntas lampah irāhavan pasir animpaṅ tūt damarggeṅ ayun,</l>
1645<l n="b">tan kevran lariniṅ rathālaris ininte deniṅ amrəg kuda,</l>
.<l n="c">ndā tan hop gəlis ikā tuvin divasa tis-tis* ṅ ve təḍuhniṅ ravi,</l>
.<l n="d">kəmbaṅiṅ varu kirṇa vāhu tumibāṅjrah iṅ sukətniṅ hənu. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. tis-tas, d. niṅ suketniṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
1650<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.23.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">duṅhusniṅ gəgər* iṅ pradəśa karəṅə̄ ləṅ-ləṅ ləsuṅ nyālaṅə̄,</l>
.<l n="b">ndān aṅhiṅ vaduri vruh iṅ tahən ikā vaṅhvan lavan ṅ iñculuk,</l>
.<l n="c">tonton konəṅ-unəṅ**nikaṅ raray anuṅgaṅ riṅ kəbo tūt lurah,</l>
.<l n="d">pasraṅniṅ rarase ləṅə̄ṅ masahuran*** ṅkāne luvukniṅ juraṅ.</l>
1655 <!-- <app>*B. A. gager.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. tonəṅ-unəṅ.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. A. mapasahuran.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.23.03" n="3">
1660<l n="a">honyaṅ vā*-ni ri madhyaniṅ savah agaryyāṅ trāsa porāḍusun,</l>
.<l n="b">vāhvamvit** i kukus-kukusnya tan avās lumrākukusniṅ dami,</l>
.<l n="c">mandrālon kukula***nya riṅ parubuṅan līlān monī tok taḍah,</l>
.<l n="d">kahyun-hyun pva sapinya mantuk adulur saṅkeṅ təgal paṅhvanan. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 39 ends here, followed by lontar 42.</app> -->
1665 <!-- <app>**B. A. vāhvamīt.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***S. AB. kukula.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.23.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">maṅkin-maṅkin adoh ulihnira lumampah lolya tan karasa*,</l>
1670<l n="b">bhūmī dvāravatī təlas kaləpasan prāpteṅ ləmah kuṇḍina,</l>
.<l n="c">vvantən deśa ləṅə pinaṅgih ira śobhāsabya bhupālaka,</l>
.<l n="d">khyatī dharmmasabhā prakaśitani rukti nyāpan akveh yaśa. </l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. kakarsa.</app> -->
.</lg>
1675<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.23.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">kodāsīnan apaṇṭa* lor ika pəkən lvah gə̄ṅ samīpāparək,</l>
.<l n="b">ṅkāraryyan sira maṅhinəp sahananiṅ vadvā paḍa yoməgil,</l>
.<l n="c">ri bvat mantən agə̄ṅ təlas vinavaran ṅgvan śrī narendrārarəm,</l>
.<l n="d">ṅkā taṅ bhrətya ri sor ḍatəṅ sama marək mə̄r ṅ hamulat riṅ tulis. </l>
1680 <!-- <app>*B. A. panda.</app> -->
.</lg>
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.23.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">siṅgih citrakarottamāhyaṅ ahaləp denyāgave stryaṅaraṅ,</l>
1685<l n="b">saṅ śrī nātha kəna prihati* ri gati nyāvarṇa śokāṅlare**,</l>
.<l n="c">maṅka piṇḍanikaṅ tulis kapahiriṅ Ivir nyān katone haji,</l>
.<l n="d">kadyakūṅ*** karāga denika mulat marmmāṅamə tan kəḍap.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. prihapi.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. AB. śokān lame.</app> -->
1690 <!-- <app>***B. A. kadyākaṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.23.07" n="7">
.<l n="a">mehniṅ ratri təka ṅ taḍah saha lavan haryyan suvarṇāpənəd,</l>
.<l n="b">boghā-neka tiniṅkah akram ahəlas muṅgvi [harəp saṅ]** prabhu,</l>
1695<l n="c">pa... athāca*** carāmaṅuñ cāru**** tumūt ryy acāra saṅ paṇḍita,</l>
.<l n="d">[bya]ktā***** bhogya kinavruhan saṅ ahulun tatvanya keṅətnira. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 42 ends up here, followed by lontar 41.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. AB. muṅgva... prabhu.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***S. AB. pa.....thāca.</app> -->
1700 <!-- <app>****B. A. carāmaṅanun taru.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>*****S. AB. ...ktā.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.23.08" n="8">
.<l n="a">sakveh saṅ Yadu bhrətya mārəp atatā muṅgvīrikaṅ tumpyatap*,</l>
1705<l n="b">prāpteka carikan dinumakən i sāmpun śrī narendrānaḍah,</l>
.<l n="c">ton tekaṅ mamaṅan paḍāsraṅ akəcap norāṅucap māṅracəp,</l>
.<l n="d">len tekaṅ macəkuk-cəkuk nəhər aminta ṅ vve taṅanyāṅave. </l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. tumpyatak. c. B. māṅrəcəp.</app> -->
.</lg>
1710
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.23.09" n="9">
.<l n="a">vvantən duhkha karo hulun rinuhuran luṅguhnya tan pobhayan,</l>
.<l n="b">hetu nyāñcala suk-səkāṅumək-umək śabdanya tan vaspada,</l>
.<l n="c">hevāsaṅga vəhaṅ tumuṅkul umiṅe ndā tan panaṅgap larih,</l>
1715<l n="d">rovaṅ nyākalihan* ri sor aṅuṭapit śabda nyavor avərə̄.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. nyakalitan.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.23.10" n="10">
.<l n="a">havyālə̄k* ika hayva duhkha tamaṅan tambul təvas kavratan**,</l>
1720<l n="b">sāsiṅ soṅgvananiṅ maṇik juga minulyan nora*** moreṅ əyəh,</l>
.<l n="c">yadyan muṅgva riṅ antarikṣa maruhur vyartheka yan tan ləvih,</l>
.<l n="d">tiṅkah**** ko garuḍā ya ta***** nahan ujar saṅ vruh vidagdheṅ haji.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. hayvālok.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. A. keratan. B. koratan.</app> -->
1725 <!-- <app>***S. AB. mona.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>****S. AB. tiṅka.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>*****S. AB. yate.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.23.11" n="11">
1730<l n="a">lāvan yogya* rəṅə̄nta paṅrəṅə̄-rəṅə̄ni ṅvaṅ ri saṅ paṇḍita,</l>
.<l n="b">tiṅkah brāhmaṇa rakva vr̥ddha saṅ ataṅgva**-n jñana śāstrāgama,</l>
.<l n="c">yan bvat kṣatriyajanma vīryya linəvih yan vaiśya yāvāt sugih,</l>
.<l n="d">tāvāt saṅ rumuhun*** vilaṅnya matuhālvat śudra norenucap.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. yogra.</app> -->
1735 <!-- <app>**B. Lontar 41 ends here, followed by lontar 44.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. A rupuhun.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.23.12" n="12">
.<l n="a">saṅkṣepanya guṇanta* vīryya kavanin dr̥vyanta yan kṣatriya,</l>
1740<l n="b">śrī kr̥ṣṇa pva guṇajña yogya palarən deniṅ vaṅ ahyun sukha,</l>
.<l n="c">pamrihteṅ samarāpraṅādadaha jivāṅadvakən i** ləṅə̄ṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">apan riṅ maguṇan piniguṇan vyartheka riṅ nirguṇa.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. gunanti.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. aṅadvakāsən i ləṅə̄n.</app> -->
1745</lg>
.</div>
.
.<div type="canto" n="23" xml:id="krsnayana_01.24">
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.24.01" n="1">
1750<l n="a">hana ta muvah agoṣṭhīsorniṅ bodhi pinarigi,</l>
.<l n="b">paḍa sukha paḍa hilyan tvak tambul sama duvəga,</l>
.<l n="c">ndan apitutur i rovaṅ nyākarvan rəsəp aṅinum,</l>
.<l n="d">tahapanika ginəgvanyān aməṅī nəhər aṅucap.</l>
.</lg>
1755<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.24.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">mapa kari kamanahtān maṅdānan ālicina,</l>
.<l n="b">pituvi kahulunānte saṅ nathārddha kaləpasən,</l>
.<l n="c">divasa mari kuṅ āmbək dāgāṅhela ṅ iṅət-iṅət,</l>
.<l n="d">apalikət aharəp riṅ viryyāṅiṇḍiṅi vibhava.</l>
1760</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.24.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">pira karika lavasniṅ janmāyuṣya t-iṅətakən,</l>
.<l n="b">rajata kanaka ratnānekānitya hananikā,</l>
.<l n="c">pagəhakna ta kavruhteṅ tatvāmatəha tamah,</l>
1765<l n="d">agavaya yaśa pamrih pə̄ṅ-pə̄ṅ kālaniṅ ahurip.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.24.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">Apan i səḍəṅiṅ a*-nvam dharmmekaṅ ləkasakna,</l>
.<l n="b">ri təlas ika tumūtāṅ arthāṅimpənakna mās,</l>
1770<l n="c">ri huvusiṅ apirak nāhan taṅ saṅgama gavayən,</l>
.<l n="d">ri ləvasiṅ ula[h] aṅhiṅ yābhyāsanta kaləpasən. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 44 ends here, followed by lontar 43.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.24.05" n="5">
1775<l n="a">nihan ahayu təmən pamaṅlo-lon i kaviratin,</l>
.<l n="b">umajar-ajara ṅ āmbək nistrəṣṇeṅ sukha-vibhava,</l>
.<l n="c">yadin anak amarabhya ndā hayveki karakətan,</l>
.<l n="d">saji-saji hananiṅ strī tan yogyān kalulutana.</l>
. <!--<app><!-\-note for the reading-\-> umajar-ajar ṅ ambək nistrəṣṇeṅ sukha-vibhava (talk to your Self, be detached from name and fame). This is a very subtle point which could only be understood if looked upon from a spiritual angle or background. I come to this translation after very deep contemplation on the subject.</app> -->
1780</lg>
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.24.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">avicarita vuvusniṅ vadvā saṅ vijah aṅucap,</l>
.<l n="b">hana mavara-varah praṅ sahyābhava kamasiga,</l>
1785<l n="c">aṅavak-avak i tiṅkahnī pinraṅakna ginalah,</l>
.<l n="d">palarih ika kapūhan tan mintar pijər aṅadəg.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.24.07" n="7">
.<l n="a">mahuvusan aṅinum ndah saṅ śrī nātha matəlasan,</l>
1790<l n="b">mavurahan arəbut ṅgvan sakvehniṅ makuvu-kuvu,</l>
.<l n="c">vijah agurah aṅə̄b riṅ kayvan ri pətəṅ arəñəb,</l>
.<l n="d">yaśa patani hibək vvaṅ śabdāḍəm jəmur avərə̄.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.24.08" n="8">
1795<l n="a">lalu divasa kamantyan māntən tekaṅ avurahan,</l>
.<l n="b">sahana-hananikaṅ vvaṅ nora taṅhi paḍa tiḍəm,</l>
.<l n="c">niyata ḍumavuhaṅ pāt śūnya ṅ rāt kadi sinirap,</l>
.<l n="d">savaṅ aji muna māmpəh dhyam sakvehnikaṅ aturu. </l>
. <!-- <app>c. B. siniram.</app> -->
1800</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.24.09" n="9">
.<l n="a">ndan asəmu-səmu tis-tis maṅkin tan hana kumilip,</l>
.<l n="b">kunaṅ ikaṅ amaṅun rəs raṅrə ghur*~ṇṇita gumuruh,</l>
.<l n="c">tinūb iṅ anila gumrit pāṅniṅ vandhira maharas,</l>
1805<l n="d">təkik akətək anəkyak ṅkaneṅ gopura karəṅə̄.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 43 ends here, followed by lontar 46.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.24.10" n="10">
.<l n="a">haṅin adulur əbun* meh a............,</l>

1815 <!-- <app>*B. A. adulur əbut...</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.24.12" n="11">
.<l n="a">vulan aluru baṅun vvaṅ mārya vīryya kasiharəp*,</l>
.<l n="b">hilaṅ** aradin ikaṅ [sə̄ṅ vetālika nya maṅiduṅ]***,</l>

.<l n="a">aruna mijil asəṅ-sə̄ṅ bāṅ vahvā[dan balakośa]*,</l>

1840<div type="canto" n="24" xml:id="krsnayana_01.25">
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.25.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">.................................tya sāmanta mantri,</l>
.<l n="b">kintu śrīndrānuja rumuhun iṅ eñjiṅ lumampah viśata,</l>
1845<l n="c">hyun-hyun ndan iṅ havan inasaban* bvat dhamarggeniṣṭāpənəd**,</l>
.<l n="d">māmba. ......................................................</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. hyun-hyun medan havan inasa tan bvat. </app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. AB. dharmagenistanāpənəd.</app> -->
.</lg>
1850<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.25.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">.................................* ri sīma-sīma * *,</l>
.<l n="b">sahyā rovaṅ kili haləp i sapolahnika tiṅkah akryan,</l>
.<l n="c">sakveh nyārəg-reg aṅadəg aniniṅhal manta narārya,</l>
.<l n="d">śabdanya rūm magu[nəmakna ri saṅ narendra śaktimanta]***.</l>
1855 <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 46 ends bere, followed by lontar 45.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. AB. śīma-səma.</app> -->
. <!--<app><!-\- note to the reading -\->aṅadəg aniniṅhal manta narārya (stood and overvhelmed at the sight of the king). Z. I.82 explains manta as ’to be the limit; the highest’, obviously taking anta (limit, end) to be its base-word. G &amp; R. 11.471 lists manta as meaning luvih (very; extreme etc). I think manta is derived from matta (drunk; crazy) in the sense of dumb-founded. Hence my translation ’overvhelmed’.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***S. AB. rum magu...</app> -->
.</lg>
1860
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.25.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">........................................................</l>
.<l n="b">[səkar avarṇ]ṇa* sərəh (h)ana rūm sundarī nyāṅhrik asraṅ,</l>
.<l n="c">sumbər-sumbər marənəb atis añəb mātra māmbək (k) uriñjəm,</l>
1865<l n="d">tīs-tīs aṅhiṅ katimaṅ [maṅ]ukih urūk saṅ** umuṅgvī hənunya.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB na sərəh.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. AB. katimaṅukih ūruksān.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.25.04" n="4">
1870<l n="a">.........................................</l>
.<l n="b">...................................məṇḍəṅ,</l>
.<l n="c">kāñcit vvaṅ nyan təkāmaṅuñul-uñul śīghra lāmpah nikāgyā,</l>
.<l n="d">pantəs yan kārvapayu ṅ papayu ndān amet pañcagavya*. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. pakəcagavya.</app> -->
1875</lg>
.</div>
.
.<div type="canto" n="25" xml:id="krsnayana_01.26">
.
1880<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.26.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">magəlar*.......................................</l>
.<l n="b">...........................kaparantiniṅ kilap,</l>
.<l n="c">honyeki pasəpan** kapaṅgih asamun kalamukan curiṅ-curiṅ havū***,</l>
.<l n="d">kirṇṇaṅ kambaṅ urāṅ uriñjəm i natarnya kura-kura gumantuṅ iṅ ta****-hən.</l>
1885 <!-- <app>*B. A. .... </app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. vasəpan.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***S. AB. hapū.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>****B. Lontar 45 ends here.</app> -->
.</lg>

.<l n="c">raṅrə vāhu maron siluṅluṅa samīpa suraga paluṅan sinaṅgaran,</l>
1895<l n="d">ṅkāne simpaṅ ikaṅ** hənu hana sərəh caru katəmu tumumpaṅ iṅ*** vatu.</l>

1900
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.26.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">tis-tis vismrəti tan hana vvaṅ i təgal nyatuṅga-tuṅgal tuvin səḍəṅ panas,</l>
.<l n="b">paṅgaṅ mvaṅ kasine pukah katulajəg taṅ usuṅan ahijo vaneh avūk,</l>
.<l n="c">gak-gok-gak svaraniṅ gagak mrədu lalitya ləṅəṅ** umuni ri varuṅ-varuṅ,</l>

.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.26.04" n="4">
1910<l n="a">yeki vyaktinikanaṅ havan matuha sə̄h dukut ika lamurākrəp aṅravut*,</l>
.<l n="b">jrah taṅ pandakaki ḍukud vvah i jahanya vinakulan akiṅ** paḍākisut,</l>
.<l n="c">pāṅniṅ thuryyaṅacaṅga-caṅgah*** alum aṅəri galigas ika meh aṅaṅgasa,</l>
.<l n="d">ri vvitniṅ kamuniṅ tikaṅ sapu ləvas hana ri harəpaniṅ buyut-buyut.</l>

.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.26.05" n="5">

1920<l n="b">vaṅ mātra svaraniṅ mrədaṅga muni riṅ nagara rumimaṅīṅ vaṅ aṅrəṅə̄,</l>
.<l n="c">sə̄k mārgganya pənuh təkā ṅ vaṅ adulur paḍa tinañan i dohnikāvarah,</l>

.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.26.06" n="6">

.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.26.07" n="6">
.<l n="a">maṅkin sə̄h sadavanikaṅ ləbuh agə̄ṅ saṅ aṅiriṅ asusun turuṅ** pəgat,</l>
.</lg>
1930<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.26.08" n="6">

.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.26.10" n="7">
.<l n="a">sāśrī* denira lakva-lakvan atitah sajuru-sajuru sahya makrama,</l>
1940<l n="b">lyab mībək təkapiṅ lumāmpah adədə̄ laku salaku paḍāṅopi** manis,</l>

1945</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.26.11" n="8">
.<l n="a">atyādbhuta haləpnikaṅ murava śaṅkakala pinakarājamaṅgala,</l>
.<l n="b">miṅgut* [t]aṅ sakaḍatvan osik i karəṅvan ira nr̥pati kr̥ṣṇa yan ḍatəṅ,</l>
.<l n="c">asraṅ taṅ vaṅ aṅuṇḍuk-uṇḍuk alayu paḍāvijah aṅucap harəp vruha,</l>
1950<l n="d">vvaṅ məñcul malayūmulat riṅ alayū pati-pati malayu baraṅ-baraṅ.</l>

.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.26.12" n="9">
.<l n="a">strī riṅ rājya paḍosyan asraṅ aruhun-ruhunan avədi sepa yan mulat*,</l>
1955<l n="b">saṅ mahyas masalah ri pahyasan ikāṅ vaṅ alaṭi-laṭi mogha tan tulus**,</l>
.<l n="c">nāthan taṅ suməlaṅ patahnika turuṅ huvus agaravalan girahyasən,</l>

.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.26.13" n="10">
.<l n="a">vvantən ratna rarātuvuh nana turuṅ panḍaṅan i lulutnya kanvaman,</l>
.<l n="b">ndan kākarṣaṇa deni vrəttanira rakva karaṇanika yan harəp vruha,</l>
1965<l n="c">ṅkāsəṅsə̄ni manahnya tan turida hetu tinaha-taha tan kavastvana,</l>
.<l n="d">lāgyāniṅgalakən ri pādukanikāsyaṅ amalaku hinəmban iṅ kaka.</l>

.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.26.14" n="11">
.<l n="a">len taṅ riṅ-raṅ akuṅ viraṅrvaṅ adadak turīda raga-ragan kataṅgama,</l>
1970<l n="b">ləs luṅha lagi tan paṅanti kavulāṅiriṅ* anututi tan hinerakən,</l>
.<l n="c">ken-kenyāmrik aniṅkab-iṅkab umiṅis pravala kadipamiṅkisan puḍak,</l>
.<l n="d">sāmpur-sampur ikārja varṇa ləpihan hinapitan aharas lavan susu.</l>

1975<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.26.15" n="12">
.<l n="a">ndan sāmpunyan umuṅgah iṅ paṅuṅaṅan humaḍaṅ i sira saṅ hañar ḍatəṅ,</l>
.<l n="b">solah sāmbək ikāraras ləməs ikaṅ ləṅən inayat* alaṇḍəsan pupū,</l>
.<l n="c">aṅlih-ṅlih mapupuk-pupuk sirah** de siniku-siku sumiṅgahī halis***,</l>
.<l n="d">marmme raśminikaṅ hiḍəp mata dinəṅ-dinəṅ aṅaḍəhi pamrihiṅ sipat****</l>

.</lg>
1985<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.26.16" n="13">
.<l n="a">hendah varṇanikaṅ vaneh talaga sə̄h sarasija pamadanya riṅ laṅə̄,</l>
.<l n="b">Ivir suṅsuṅ guyu yan mulat matanikāniru-niru śatapatra kesari,</l>
.<l n="c">paṅro*-n tuñjuṅ** ikaṅ tapih lagi kasiṅkap i siririṅ panūb***nikaṅ aṅin,</l>
.<l n="d">bhavanyādyan umiṅgək-iṅgək aṅucap laləh ika kadi haṅsa kāryakan****.</l>
