.<l n="d">apan maṅke təvas avurahan taṅ rājya.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 86 ends here, followed by lontar 85.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.42.04" n="4">
3305<l n="a">hāh śabdanteman i manah i vaṅ yā māpəs,</l>
.<l n="b">āmbək tan kṣatriya kuraṅ irāṅ kr̥ṣṇa,</l>
.<l n="c">tan maṅkā* siṅha tan atakut eṅgal krodha,</l>
.<l n="d">yan riṅ śatrūvakan ika kapan mavədya. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. tan daṅkā.</app> -->
3310</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.42.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">āpan yadyan ləməsən iṅ ulah tan yukti,</l>
.<l n="b">lam-lam tekaṅ bhuvana ri tayaniṅ ḍaṇḍa,</l>
.<l n="c">saṅkśepan kr̥ṣṇa hilaṅaknāpan yogya,</l>
3315<l n="d">akveh vvaṅ māna yan inubhayan sāmbəknya.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.42.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">təkvan rakveki hana karə*ṅə̄ riṅ śāstra,</l>
.<l n="b">tan tiṅkahniṅ prabhu manah irāṅgə̄ṅ sāma,</l>
3320<l n="c">nyāṅ maṅhvan tovi vulatakna vruh maḍaṇḍa,</l>
.<l n="d">tontontā ndah palu sapinikā yan vaṅəla.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.42.07" n="7">
.<l n="a">bhoh-bhoh mōn ṅvaṅ sumahura ri śabdantāpyak,</l>
3325<l n="b">saṅ śrī kr̥ṣṇātiśaya sira kocap siṅha,</l>
.<l n="c">yadyan tutən tututana* sirādoh vədya,</l>
.<l n="d">lāvan tekaṅ vvaṅ anututi dūrān vānya. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. takən tuta tada.</app> -->
.</lg>
3330<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.42.08" n="8">
.<l n="a">yadyastun vānya niyata katon patya*nya,</l>
.<l n="b">tonən taṅ daityapati makamukhya ṅ kaṅsa,</l>
.<l n="c">kocap damodara krətayaśeṅ triloka,</l>
.<l n="d">apan byakta prakaśita siran viṣṇvaṅśa. </l>
3335 <!-- <app>*S. AB. satya.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.42.09" n="9">
.<l n="a">nāhan pājarnika tan inivə̄ tan kobər,</l>
.<l n="b">vetan kulvan kidul avurahan lavan lor,</l>
3340<l n="c">uśānye neriti dahana ḍik bhāyabya,</l>
.<l n="d">maṅkin-maṅki*-n amərəh asəlur** taṅ śabda.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 85 ends here, followed by lontar 88.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. AB. aselar.</app> -->
.</lg>
3345<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.42.10" n="10">
.<l n="a">ndan saṅ śrī cedi katəkan ikaṅ duhkhāgə̄ṅ,</l>
.<l n="b">tan len rovaṅiṅ alara jarasandhāśā,</l>
.<l n="c">tandvāhə̄m tan masuvayan adan kapvāgyā,</l>
.<l n="d">sə̄h ta mantrī bala paḍa marək saṅrabdha*. </l>
3350 <!-- <app>*B. A. sabhanda.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.42.11" n="11">
.<l n="a">ndā tan* sālapakna tan asuve taṅ hə̄man,</l>
.<l n="b">aṅhiṅ saṅ kr̥ṣṇa pəjahana tutən petən,</l>
3355<l n="c">eṅgal deniṅ mamuput i vuvus tan jambat,</l>
.<l n="d">prāyandug krodha tatan apiṅit riṅ nīti. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. ndān sālapakna.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
3360<div type="canto" n="42" xml:id="krsnayana_01.43">
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.43.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">kunaṅ sira narārya rukma təka mañjiṅ jro purī,</l>
.<l n="b">ḍəṅə ri kahilaṅ saṅ antən atiduṣṭa rārānilib,</l>
3365<l n="c">janārddana bəlah matāməgati tambaṅa duhkhani,</l>
.<l n="d">na hetu nr̥paputra rukma humatur mare saṅ bapa. </l>
. <!-- <app>*A. the number of the canto is 43.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.43.02" n="2">
3370<l n="a">ḍatəṅ sira ri sanmukha pravaca bhismakendrādhipa,</l>
.<l n="b">taman vənaṅ aśabda humrət aməgəṅ vijilniṅ taṅis,</l>
.<l n="c">amaṅkəl i gulū savaṅ kudu savetni gə̄ṅniṅ lara,</l>
.<l n="d">mapaṅ tuna-tunā ṅ ujar kasaragan dahat vāspada.</l>
.</lg>
3375<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.43.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">panəmbahiṅ atīta duhkha satatāṅharas jə̄ṅ haji,</l>
.<l n="b">ləvəs takari saṅ narendra viparita riṅ niṣpraṇa,</l>
.<l n="c">ri tiṅkah i si rukmiṇīnalap i kr̥ṣṇa gə̄ṅ drohakā,</l>
.<l n="d">kuraṅ naya nr̥patyapuṅguṅ ahivaṅ sinaṅguh prabhu.</l>
3380
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.43.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">krame saṅ atəkən rasāgama taman vruheṅ iṅgita,</l>
.<l n="b">avās vihikane salah kənani śīlaniṅ vvaṅ vaneh*,</l>
3385<l n="c">apan tan inucap tikaṅ vvaṅ atimudhā tan śāstravit,</l>
.<l n="d">ikaṅ vuta kapan ta yan vruha ri bhedaniṅ bhāvalis. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 88 ends here, followed by lontar 87.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.43.05" n="5">
3390<l n="a">hana pva prəthukīrtti reṇani si rukmiṇī durjana,</l>
.<l n="b">kapāna vihikan pravrəttyahala len pravrəttyahayu,</l>
.<l n="c">katūt pva naranātha toh riṅ apa yan mahayvāṅ ulah,</l>
.<l n="d">tan apənəta juga ṅ manah katalu deniṅ aṅgə̄ṅ hayu*.</l>
. <!-- <app>d. B. tan āməbəka...</app> -->
3395 <!-- <app>*B. A. katalu yen inaṅgaṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.43.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">nihan pinakadharmaniṅ laki-laki svatantrāsiha*,</l>
.<l n="b">ri saṅ satya mara drəvyaniṅ rabhi suśīla bhaktyātvaṅa**,</l>
3400<l n="c">yadin sugiha tovin anvama*** muvah sujanāhayu,</l>
.<l n="d">yathākrama tumūta tiṅkahan ikā hade tūtana.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. pva tantrāsiha.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. bhaktyātvaṅi.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. A. anvam muvah.</app> -->
3405 <!-- <app>b. B. si satya mara.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.43.07" n="7">
.<l n="a">tahām bapa tahā ndya teki vənaṅ iṅ kadi ṅ vaṅ prabhu,</l>
.<l n="b">umilvana ri buddhiniṅ kalana durjanātyadhama,</l>
3410<l n="c">nda satyani panambavanta laki maṅḍalih sobhayan,</l>
.<l n="d">lanenuhutakən maraṅ prabhu ləñok dahat sor*nira. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. so nira.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.43.08" n="8">
3415<l n="a">ike vacanani ṅhulun pagəhakən gəgə̄nte hati,</l>
.<l n="b">kunaṅ ri panəmunta* duhkha vihikan yayahtānaku,</l>
.<l n="c">ləhəṅ kita tikāpa tan sinəsəl iṅ sarāt duryaśa,</l>
.<l n="d">parāniṅ pavāda saṅhulun ikāpa tah lampunən.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. paṅəmutiṅ duhka.</app> -->
3420</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.43.09" n="9">
.<l n="a">ikaṅ gati kachidra tan kita jugekihən maṅkana,</l>
.<l n="b">nihan vulatanta parvacariteṅ atītālama*,</l>
.<l n="c">prakāśa sira rāmabhadra tuvi śakti viṣṇvātmaka,</l>
3425<l n="d">tathāpi sira duhkhabharakna riṅ kidaṅ kañcana. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 87 ends here, followed by lontar 90.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.43.10" n="10">
.<l n="a">kaliṅan i vuvusku hayva ta bapālarāśa dahat,</l>
3430<l n="b">manah juga ya saṅ kadi ṅ mala manah muvah paṅhilaṅ,</l>
.<l n="c">prasiddha bañu mūla kāraṇanikaṅ latək* yan hana,</l>
.<l n="d">avās vinasəhan hilaṅ pinariśuddha deniṅ bañu. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. latik.</app> -->
.</lg>
3435<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.43.11" n="11">
.<l n="a">ikaṅ lara haneṅ śarīra niyatanya gantyan sukha,</l>
.<l n="b">riṅ driya tan ora yāmaḍana moha lāvan rajah,</l>
.<l n="c">yavat hana śarīra tāvat ika yan pamuktya ṅ sukha,</l>
.<l n="d">nda tan vruh ika yan kabañcana ri bhoga mogha lupa.</l>
3440</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="43" xml:id="krsnayana_01.44">
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.44.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">ndah vyaktinya tikāṅharəp sugih adarppāhyas mamujābrata,</l>
3445<l n="b">luṅhāṅdoh alayar matiṅgalniṅ anak-rabyahyun i mās pirak,</l>
.<l n="c">prāpta pva ṅka dhaneśvaran vək i pənuh taṅ ratnottama,</l>
.<l n="d">yan dharmmeki ləhəṅ kuneṅ yan atəṅət nirdon ikaṅ mās pirak.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.44.02" n="2">
3450<l n="a">saṅ mantrī paməgət muvah caritanən saṅ vallabhe saṅ prabhu,</l>
.<l n="b">vitniṅ duhkhita tan svatantra vəkasiṅ byāpāra tan lalana,</l>
.<l n="c">soresuk humatur marək tar arusuh sasiṅ pakon i tuhan,</l>
.<l n="d">aṅhiṅ vīryya pinetnirān tan alavas ṅkā byakta tan laṅgəṅa.</l>
.</lg>
3455<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.44.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">mvaṅ saṅ devaguru [m]pu ka*-śa karəṅə̄ riṅ sarvadeśāntara,</l>
.<l n="b">śiṣyākveh** rəṣi vālaka praṇata len kriyan-kriyan valūniṅ sukha,</l>
.<l n="c">tambayañ cinacarnirāṅhuvəgaṅ an*** santoṣa darppāsisig,</l>
.<l n="d">ndān ahyun ri kabhuktyaniṅ phala rikaṅ dlahanya kampir muvah. </l>
3460 <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 90 ends here, followed by lontar 89.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. śasyākveh, </app> -->
. <!-- <app>***S. AB. cinacanar aṅhuvə̄gaṅ an.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.44.04" n="4">
3465<l n="a">nāhan varṇani saṅ* bhujaṅga kaśa** tātyanteṅ ivəh durgama,</l>
.<l n="b">hritniṅ hāra kahārya yen iṅət-iṅet mvaṅ yuktiniṅ paṅguṇa,</l>
.<l n="c">ṅel-ṅel an mara yan masātuna tanah pūh taṅ śarīrākəsə̄l</l>
.<l n="d">ṅhiṅ lekan marikenusir pira tikaṅ bhuktyā tan akveh dahat.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. sa.</app> -->
3470 <!-- <app>**S. AB. ka...tātyanteṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.44.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">lavan vyākaraṇeki rakva vuvusən varṇan ta saṅ śābdikā,</l>
.<l n="b">sūtrākveh tinamāknārddha masuve ndā tan vənaṅ lālana,</l>
3475<l n="c">polahniṅ pada len prayoga piniṅit mvāṅ kadi ta pratyaya*,</l>
.<l n="d">ṅhiṅ tirvan kətikāṅ kinārya kaharəp nda tan magə̄ṅ riṅ phala. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. kadi kapratyaya.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>d. The literal meaning is ’only quotations, and when the time comes to see the result, it does not yield anythiṅ good’. It is a description of a person who has studied a lot, but has not experienced the truth about what he has learned or in other words he has not been able to translate his knowledge into practice. It is like the statement in the Wedhatama (1.9) that power/knowledge obtained from occultism is like body-cream, which does not penetrate into the body, but stays outside the flesh and skin only. In moments of danger, it is useless or worthless.</app> -->
.</lg>
3480<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.44.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">varṇan saṅ pracəṅil bisāṅiṅət-iṅət pūrvottara vyahata*,</l>
.<l n="b">sāsiṅ vākyārusit-rusitnya rinasan yāṅde putəkniṅ hati,</l>
.<l n="c">tatkālenadu riṅ sabha pvaya paḍāṅhel kapvāmet drəsana,</l>
.<l n="d">tan len dakṣiṇa hetuniṅ kariṅətən lāvan tikaṅ pāləman. </l>
3485 <!-- <app>*B. A. vyahaka.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.44.07" n="7">
.<l n="a">aṅhiṅ teki ləhəṅ gave kavi vənaṅ līlā*-radin tan bhara,</l>
.<l n="b">santoṣeṅ gati yān tuseṅ paṅasihiṅ mitra priyānambuṅi,</l>
3490<l n="c">nora ṅ vīryya sadenya rāmya laṅə̄ sāsiṅ paranyāṅlicin,</l>
.<l n="d">ṅhiṅ duhkhān səḍəṅ iṅ tanah vatu-vatu n lāvan kalisniṅ karas. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 89 ends here, followed by lontar 92.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.44.08" n="8">
3495<l n="a">nāntən vistara sojar iṅvaṅ* i kitāvas Ivir haneki vuvus,</l>
.<l n="b">yan sahyaṅ** gaṇitādiśāstra niyateka svarga rakva ṅ phala,</l>
.<l n="c">lāvan taṅ brata len trikāya ginave byaktān tuməmva ṅ hayu,</l>
.<l n="d">gəgvan iṅ vvaṅ ikā ndya taṅ pinakadon vvantən maṇikniṅ maṇik.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. aṅvaṅ.</app> -->
3500 <!-- <app>**B. A. sahyan.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="44" xml:id="krsnayana_01.45">
.
3505<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.45.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">kunaṅ iṅ kadi māsku rājaputra,</l>
.<l n="b">vəkas kṣatriya tusniṅ ādijanma,</l>
.<l n="c">sutaniṅ bhuvanātha yogya gə̄ṅən,</l>
.<l n="d">musira kirtyya lavān janānurāga.</l>
3510</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.45.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">sipi hevəh ikaṅ guṇāṅipuk rāt,</l>
.<l n="b">atidurga pva yd kaprabhun pinaṅguh,</l>
.<l n="c">tan ulihniṅ apuṅguṅ alpa buddhi,</l>
3515<l n="d">bisama ṅ rājya mateki yan pramada.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.45.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">yadiyan hana rāja śatru vaṅəla,</l>
.<l n="b">ləməsən sāsiṅ upāyane rəcəpnya,</l>
3520<l n="c">ri təlasnya kənān adāna bheda,</l>
.<l n="d">humənəṅ pveki rikān tibāna ḍaṇḍa.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.45.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">tuvi hayva tan āpanas virodha,</l>
3525<l n="b">ri səḍəṅnyan pamusuh makāṇṭa vr̥ddhya,</l>
.<l n="c">nda nihan hana taṅ virodha śatru,</l>
.<l n="d">ri samaṅkā tuluṅənta śīghra-śīghra.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.45.05" n="5">
3530<l n="a">ṅuniveh sira saṅ pinaṣṭi mantrī,</l>
.<l n="b">pinatih saṅ pinakādi bāhuḍaṇḍa,</l>
.<l n="c">pili*hən makataṅgvana ṅ kabhaktin,</l>
.<l n="d">vruha teṅ śāstra pamāvaneṅgitajña.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 92 ends here, followed by lontar 91.</app> -->
3535</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.45.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">ulahiṅ ratu sarvasopacāra,</l>
.<l n="b">gatiniṅ deva tirun təkap narārya,</l>
.<l n="c">makapagvan abudhi māsih iṅ* rāt,</l>
3540<l n="d">apa yapan bhuvanātmaka svabhāva. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. i rat</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.45.07" n="7">
.<l n="a">maluya pva ṅ ujarkvi* ṅuni māsku,</l>
3545<l n="b">nyata** tekaṅ karatun hane vəkaṅku,</l>
.<l n="c">gavayən tikanaṅ karājaśikṣan,</l>
.<l n="d">pagehiṅ śasana ṅuni ṅ ādiśāstra.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. ajarkvi.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. AB. nyama.</app> -->
3550</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.45.08" n="8">
.<l n="a">i hələmnya tikāṅ ulah kasāntan,</l>
.<l n="b">ri ləvasnyeki ṅ avak kṣayātivr̥ddha,</l>
.<l n="c">i paḍəmnikaṅ indriya byāmoha,</l>
3555<l n="d">satatābhyāsanikaṅ param[a]*-virāgya. </l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. param virāgya.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="45" xml:id="krsnayana_01.46">
3560
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.46.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">nahan hiṅan i śabda saṅ nr̥pati bhiṣmakāmituturi,</l>
.<l n="b">saṅ śrī rukma sira praṇamya kamənānirān sumahura,</l>
.<l n="c">yadyastun vuvusiṅ rare tuvi pinisiṅgihən yan ahayu,</l>
3565<l n="d">ndīṅvaṅ tan pamituhva sojaraniṅ āpta yogya pitutur.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.46.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">ndān aṅhiṅ palakun ta maṅhilaṅa duhkhani ṅhulun agə̄ṅ,</l>
.<l n="b">deniṅ kr̥ṣṇa jugāvamāna viparīta sampay i haji,</l>
3570<l n="c">alpanyālpa ri saṅ narendra kadi tan hanāmada bhaya,</l>
.<l n="d">sakvehniṅ vvaṅ adhāsta denya hiniḍəp-hiḍəpnika sukət. </l>
. <!-- <app>c. B. naya.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.46.03" n="3">
3575<l n="a">nāntən prāthanani ṅhulun ya ta rəṅə̄n tə̄kap narapati,</l>
.<l n="b">candrāditya bhaṭāra dharma sira sākṣibhuta mulata,</l>
.<l n="c">yan tan mātya si kr̥ṣṇa denikiṅ anāma rukma su*-yaśa,</l>
.<l n="d">mvaṅ putrinta si rukmiṇī tan uliheṅ svarājya nagara. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 91 ends here, followed by lontar 94.</app> -->
3580</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.46.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">yekin tan pasabhā ri kuṇḍina patik narārya layata,</l>
.<l n="b">vās-vās tan mulate ṅka dasa kulagotra varga sahana,</l>
.<l n="c">āpan tulya pəjah kətāṅ inavamāna tan pamaləsa,</l>
3585<l n="d">nirdon tekiṅ avaknirārsa kahananya keraṅ-iraṅa.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.46.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">tiṅkahniṅ* bala vallabhā gati ginə̄ṅaken saṅ ahulun,</l>
.<l n="b">saṅ sāmpun tiniban sukhātiśaya bhoga vīrya saphala,</l>
3590<l n="c">yapvan durbala saṅ prabhu nyata** paratra śatru ḍatəṅa,</l>
.<l n="d">yekān sāra samaṅkanādadaha jīvitāmrihakna.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. ni.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. nyama.</app> -->
.</lg>
3595<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.46.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">mevəh rakva katə*mvan iṅ gati kamantyan uttama guṇa,</l>
.<l n="b">śūrā taṅgvana rājanīti saphalā mahayva nagara,</l>
.<l n="c">vyartha ṅvaṅ vruh iṅ āgamativiṣamendriyān vədi-vədi,</l>
.<l n="d">kadya pahyasan iṅ pətəṅ saṅ amiveka tan saha ləkas.</l>
3600</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.46.07" n="7">
.<l n="a">saṅkṣepanya vuvus patik nr̥pati māmvitāmrih alaga,</l>
.<l n="b">yadyan mātya sabhāgya rāmya marikāñjayān parajayan,</l>
.<l n="c">pojarni ṅhulun akṣamā hivaṅ iki ṅka pālaṅ-alaṅa,</l>
3605<l n="d">yāvāt kṣatriya dharma tan dadi surud ri sāmbək adhika.</l>
.</lg>
.</div>
.
.<div type="canto" n="46" xml:id="krsnayana_01.47">
3610
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.47.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">sedeṅ umətu sake jro rājya saṅ rājaputra,</l>
.<l n="b">mulih adadak adandan sahase ṅ ambək agyā,</l>
.<l n="c">tuvi rahina marekāṅ arka sāmpun prakāŚa,</l>
3615<l n="d">sahananikaṅ inajñan saṅ sakeṅ* doh pralabdha. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 94 ends, followed by lontar 94.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.47.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">nagara kapənuhan vah vvaṅ haneṅ rāja mārga,</l>
3620<l n="b">təka ri təgal-təgalni rājya sə̄h sañjatābap,</l>
.<l n="c">asmu hima padə̄ṅdə̄ṅniṅ dhvajākrəp pinañjər,</l>
.<l n="d">pada humadaṅ aṅantyākən vijil saṅ narārya.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.47.03" n="3">
3625<l n="a">nr̥pasuta malə̄k iṅ* bhuṣaṇāṅənṭahāsa,</l>
.<l n="b">maṅadəg akaṭik** vandhāvastra sampun siniṅsət,</l>
.<l n="c">makuṭa rinasukāndəlnyārdha rəṅgaṅ rinehan,</l>
.<l n="d">pinahayu pinarikṣāṅgaṅnya lāvan pagəhnya.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB in.</app> -->
3630 <!-- <app>**S. A akavi. B. akati.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.47.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">kavaca binəbəd iṅ mās rapvanenak rapət*nya,</l>
.<l n="b">minata mirah amintaṅ muñcarākrəp maṇiknya,</l>
3635<l n="c">amuvuhi raras embuh varṇa ken rājaputra,</l>
.<l n="d">avak ira kadi dinyus riṅ va maṅkin sateja.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. ravət. d. B. ava ira.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.47.05" n="5">
3640<l n="a">təka tumuluy anuṅgaṅ riṅ rathāpan saranta,</l>
.<l n="b">ri luputa nr̥pa kr̥ṣṇāṅdadyakən gyaniṅ āmbək,</l>
.<l n="c">inarahakən umaṅkat rāja sāmanta mantrī,</l>
.<l n="d">paḍahi murava ginval ghoṣanākon* lumakva. </l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. ghosana kon.</app> -->
3645</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.47.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">praśama pareṅ umaṅkat ghūrṇita ṅ bhr̥tya saṅgha,</l>
.<l n="b">saha tabə-tabəhan gə̄ṅ maṅgalāniṅ mr̥daṅga,</l>
.<l n="c">kumisīk asahuran taṅ śaṅka rojeh guməntər,</l>
3650<l n="d">satata ta-rara-rāt-ṅek śabdaniṅ śaṅka tinyup.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.47.07" n="7">
.<l n="a">Śakata gumelek kadbhutadulur ghora gumerit,</l>
.<l n="b">garaba-garabag abyuran kratbb ni vvaṅ akveh,</l>
3655<l n="c">gaja turaga padāṅhrik hinərtt agya lumakva,</l>
.<l n="d">akus-akas ikanatryaṅantyaken sUrathi*.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 93 ends here, followed by lontar 96.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.47.08" n="8">
3660<l n="a">kaləpas i sukuniṅ rājyā tikaṅ rājabhr̥tya,</l>
.<l n="b">salaku-lakuniṅ agyā, tan vədi mārga durga,</l>
.<l n="c">katəmu śaraṇaniṅ śatrvamə̄nər ndah tinūt*nya,</l>
.<l n="d">juraṅ alas agənət sāk śīrṇa deniṅ vvaṅ akveh. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. tanūt.</app> -->
3665</lg>
.</div>
.
.<div type="canto" n="47" xml:id="krsnayana_01.48">
.
3670<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.48.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">luṅhā ken rājaputrānuta maməjahaneṅ kr̥ṣṇa petən parāna,</l>
.<l n="b">ndā tāñjrih saṅkaṭa nyāṅhada balanira kapvārasuk bhūṣaṇanya,</l>
.<l n="c">āpan śrī cedi rājānukəri marək anūt mvaṅ vatək māgadhendra,</l>
.<l n="d">ndah yekā hetu vr̥ṣṇyandhaka kula masnehā*-praṅ ataṅga-taṅgan. </l>
3675 <!-- <app>*S. AB. masnāhāpraṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.48.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">siṅgih saṅ cedi yogyān katakutana mahāvīrya śūreṅ pravīra,</l>
.<l n="b">hyaṅ sor iṅ śakti sāmarthya* vənaṅ aṅavaśākən sapañjiṅ sumeru,</l>
3680<l n="c">ndān ambək cedirājā muvah anaha-nahānaṅśaye śaktiniṅ len,</l>
.<l n="d">vruh rakve sāra saṅ yādavabala baladevādi kāṅən kataṅgəl. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. sāmār?s ya.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.48.03" n="3">
3685<l n="a">yekan marmmānikaṅ praṅ mapahidəṅan ikaṅ sañjatāṅher ataṇḍəg,</l>
.<l n="b">ṅhiṅ molah tuṅguliṅ rukmabala midər amet soṅgvaniṅ padmanābha,</l>
.<l n="c">ryyāṅkatnyāṅsə̄ hanan mundur alimunan apan tan kavastvan parāna,</l>
.<l n="d">miṅgat Ivir dhūmaniṅ khāṇḍavadahana tinūbniṅ prahāra pracaṇḍa.</l>
.</lg>
3690<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.48.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">ndan śrī cedyapagəh sa*-ñjatānira humənəṅ Ivir teḍuhniṅ samudra,</l>
.<l n="b">kapvādum ṅgvan siran mukhya mapagəh i təṅgah pagvaniṅ rājabhrətya,</l>
.<l n="c">maṅgəh saṅ śrī jarāsandha panahuṅ i təṅən tāhu tāṅdāni tiṅkah,</l>
.<l n="d">sakveh saṅ** śura muṅgviṅ kiva pinakapakənyāṅaran dantavakra***. </l>
3695 <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 96 ends here, followed by lontar 95.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. sa.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***S. AB. dantanakra.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.48.05" n="5">
3700<l n="a">maṅkin-maṅkin matambəh ri vuri* bala mahārāja cedyāpramāda,</l>
.<l n="b">sə̄h-səh sāmantarājāśva gaja saha rathātuṅgalan ratna rəṅga,</l>
.<l n="c">himpər vintaṅ vuvur kadbhuta makapuratuk səṅ i cūḍamaṇi ya,</l>
.<l n="d">akrəp śakṣāt səkarniṅ kamurugan aputih paṅjrahiṅ śveta chatra. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. vura.</app> -->
3705</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.48.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">tonton maṅkin lumaṅkuṅ lumaku kadi hilīniṅ vvay iṅ yamunādrəs,</l>
.<l n="b">kahyun-hyun tan pəgat maṅkin asusun i havan tūt gəgər tan pakayvan,</l>
.<l n="c">Ivir tərik mevvīvu śākṣāt səmut aṅalih umah konəṅ-onəṅ marampak,</l>
3710<l n="d">himpər ḍaṅḍaṅ* sumūb ghūrṇita parəṅ asurak tan humuṅ deniṅ dohnya. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. ḍaḍaṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.48.07" n="7">
.<l n="a">ndā-ndā mundur tikaṅ yādavabala makukud makram alon lakunya,</l>
3715<l n="b">ndātan saṅkeṅ takut molah akətəran inajñan tiniṅkah ṅgvananya,</l>
.<l n="c">sotan taṅ papraṅan durga juraṅ i hiriṅan lvah lurah səṅka-səṅkan,</l>
.<l n="d">ndā nāhan hetuniṅ sañjata vinaluyakən taṅəbaraṅ deniṅ olah.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.48.08" n="8">
3720<l n="a">apan paṅdān ira śrī haladhara pinatih saṅ vatək vrəṣṇi* saṅgha,</l>
.<l n="b">mākram-kram Ivir patapniṅ vatu gaja ratha pekāśva rākṣānurākṣa,</l>
.<l n="c">Ivir kevəhniṅ pasaṅ deniṅ aṅiriṅ i glana ta sūkṣma kapiṅ pāt,</l>
.<l n="d">ndā tan pendahni** tāṅan ta parihata nagāmbəknya śūrāṅlagāna.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 95 ends here, followed by lontar 98.</app> -->
3725 <!-- <app>*B. A. na.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="48" xml:id="krsnayana_01.49">
.
3730<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.49.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">kvehniṅ yadubhr̥tya pinəm hinatyan,</l>
.<l n="b">prakāśa kocap yuyudhana* pārtu,</l>
.<l n="c">lavan saṅ akrūra videharāja,</l>
.<l n="d">svapalka vikrānta gada prasena. </l>
3735 <!-- <app>*S. AB. yuyudhivi.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.49.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">len taṅ sunakṣatra* yadupravīra,</l>
.<l n="b">ratu jvariṅ** mvaṅ pr̥thu śakradeha***,</l>
3740<l n="c">saṅ bhaṅga kārā mr̥dhu****-kādhirāja,</l>
.<l n="d">mvaṅ saṅ vr̥sadarbha ***** vicitrakādi. </l>
. <!-- <app>*S. A. sukakṣatra. B. sucakṣatra.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**The reading ratu jvariṅ (?) is not certain. It seems to be the name of a hero or king, but I fail to find it in the other sources which sound similar. </app> -->
. <!-- <app>***S. It might be satrājita. </app> -->
3745 <!-- <app>****B. A. mr̥cukādirāja. </app> -->
. <!-- <app>*****S. AB. vr̥haddarbba.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.49.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">nirdanta len satyaka śaraṇākhya,</l>
3750<l n="b">vidhuratha* mvaṅ kr̥tadharma vīra,</l>
.<l n="c">lavan śatadyumna viśeṣa śakti,</l>
.<l n="d">dudū tikaṅ bala śūra mantrī. </l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. vidhiratha.</app> -->
.</lg>
3755<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.49.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">aṅgyat suraknyāsraṅ aṅaṅkat-aṅkat,</l>
.<l n="b">parəṅ lavan bheri kalā mr̥daṅga,</l>
.<l n="c">pasaṅghani mvaṅ gaja vaji vr̥nda,</l>
.<l n="d">prodbhuta paṅhriknika siṅhanāda*.</l>
3760 <!-- <app>c. B. asaṅghani mvaṅ.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>*S. AB.niṅ asiṅhanāda.</app> -->
.</lg>
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.49.05" n="5">
3765<l n="a">təṅəranya matimbun anekavarṇa,</l>
.<l n="b">hanādbhutāṅlañjəra aṅādakāra,</l>
.<l n="c">himpər ghanākandəl atiṇḍu-tiṇḍu,</l>
.<l n="d">ikaṅ kuməndəṅ kadi setubandha.</l>
. <!-- <app>c. Z.II.2014 atiṇḍu-tiṇḍu: forming a globular mass (?) (hill, clouds, trees seen from above). I think Z. is close to the target, but feels not quite sure. I agree with him because I too feel, that the sound of the banners flowing in the wind is not implied. Therefore I render it with ’rumbling’.</app> -->
3770</lg>
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.49.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">honyaṅ lumaṅkuṅ* baṅun indracāpa,</l>
.<l n="b">vaneh savur Ivir kusuma prakirṇa,</l>
3775<l n="c">len taṅ dhvajābāṅ sarasah marāmpak,</l>
.<l n="d">lvirnyāsavaṅ parvata tunva-tunvan. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A lumaṅku.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.49.07" n="7">
3780<l n="a">sār sə̄k pənuh sañjataniṅ sataṇḍa,</l>
.<l n="b">tuvin mahā-śakti paḍa pravīra,</l>
.<l n="c">kocap yan iṅ śatru kr̥tapradhāna,</l>
.<l n="d">prasiddha maṅgəh pinakāṅgarākṣa.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 98 ends here, followed by lontar 97.</app> -->
3785</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.49.08" n="8">
.<l n="a">yekādi nānā tinitih ṅgvananya*,</l>
.<l n="b">vaneh paḍāṅlad bubuhan pinarṇah,</l>
.<l n="c">honyāpupul toh ika sekapakṣa,</l>
3790<l n="d">ikaṅ gəlar sampun areh subaddha. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. ṅrvanya.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="49" xml:id="krsnayana_01.50">
3795
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.50.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">byūha śrī baladeva saha bala,</l>
.<l n="b">maṅkin kambulanān punəmu lavan,</l>
.<l n="c">cedyabhedya gəlarnira matəguh,</l>
3800<l n="d">ācchedyākrama* tan pacacadan.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. A. ānedyākrama. B. acedyākrama.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.50.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">tambayniṅ praṅ ikāgara-garahan,</l>
3805<l n="b">kapvānon i lavan ya silih uhuh,</l>
.<l n="c">dudvāsraṅ-sraṅ aduk-dukan aṅusir,</l>
.<l n="d">ndan sambinya maduk-dukan ucapan.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.50.03" n="3">
3810<l n="a">umban sə̄h luməpas makakərəpuk,</l>
.<l n="b">tan pendah kalapenadu karəṅə̄,</l>
.<l n="c">bə̄ṅ-bə̄ṅ-pə̄ṅ alivatnya ri taliṅa,</l>
.<l n="d">mah sār teg maṅəneri saṅ apayuṅ.</l>
.</lg>
3815<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.50.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">Utpata ṅ palagan hinaṅən-aṅən,</l>
.<l n="b">lumrāvarṇa hudan vatu tumibā,</l>
.<l n="c">pasraṅniṅ tahulan binəkəmakən,</l>
.<l n="d">Ivir vintaṅ tumibā makapuratuk. </l>
3820 <!-- <app>a. A. uta ḍataṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.50.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">vvantən teki vəhaṅnya kəna bəkəm,</l>
.<l n="b">krodhāhyun maləsārddha kasakitan,</l>
3825<l n="c">ryy undurnyān sinurak mahidu-hidu,</l>
.<l n="d">hoyag untunikā ndan ugah-ugah.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.50.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">tonton taṅ hinusir tinuju tinūk,</l>
3830<l n="b">arjjāpan kinapat-kapatan ales,</l>
.<l n="c">dūran kadyaku kon arama hivaṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">liṅnyāśabda təhər maṅijig-ijig.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.50.07" n="7">
3835<l n="a">vikvāṅadva duta hupama ragang,</l>
.<l n="b">milvārmor* aṅusi milu malayū,</l>
.<l n="c">nirdon vaninika hinaləm-aləm,</l>
.<l n="d">dūran kahvata tambəhan adəmak.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 97 ends here, followed by lontar 100.</app> -->
3840</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.50.08" n="8">
.<l n="a">hrū makveh luməpas paḍa mahəlar,</l>
.<l n="b">kirṇāvarṇa vala makapələsat,</l>
.<l n="c">kabvaṅ mūr marasat kadi tinəbak,</l>
3845<l n="d">deniṅ tuṅgul agə̄ṅ maṅubat-abit.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.50.09" n="9">
.<l n="a">prāpta ṅ sañjata pat lima* tuməḍuh,</l>
.<l n="b">vvaṅ-vvaṅ thani ḍaḍapnya ləvas avūk,</l>
3850<l n="c">siṅsal hənti vəsinya tahi-tahin,</l>
.<l n="d">raṅgah-raṅgah ikaṅ janur akuniṅ. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. pat lama.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.50.10" n="10">
3855<l n="a">ambək* garva paḍātabə-tabəhan,</l>
.<l n="b">tok-tokanya parəṅ makapələtok**,</l>
.<l n="c">sakvehniṅ ruməṅə̄ makaburəṅaṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">mpuṅkvā ndyājar-ajar grahaka paṅan. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. tambək.</app> -->
3860</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.50.11" n="11">
.<l n="a">nāhan taṅ mapagut ḍaḍap apapag,</l>
.<l n="b">mundur n-ton pagalahnikaṅ i vuri,</l>
.<l n="c">lāmbāmbəknya silih praṅ arəgag,</l>
3865<l n="d">tan pendah cəṅiliṅ paḍa kapalaṅ.</l>
.</lg>
.</div>
.
.<div type="canto" n="50" xml:id="krsnayana_01.51">
3870
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.51.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">lume*kas ikaṅ saha səñjata savu-savuriṅ bala tan paharan,</l>
.<l n="b">ya ta rumuhun an paṅarəpniṅ alaga tumuluy sumarambah arok,</l>
.<l n="c">makakuratak svaraniṅ galah amalu sumiṅgah-aniṅgahakən*,</l>
3875<l n="d">ikaṅ aḍaḍap tinutug maləs anutug aniṅkab-iniṅkabakən.</l>
. <!-- <app>a. savu-savur iṅ bala tan paharan (soldiers without units). Usually in a battle array, all the soldiers are arranged into units, which should function in accordance with a pre-arranged strategy. It seems that the bala tan paharan (soldiers without units) is designed to confuse the opposition. See bala patavur in 50.5a. </app> -->
. <!-- <app>*B. A. sumiṅgahan inuṅgahakən.</app> -->
.</lg>
.
3880<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.51.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">təka saka sevu salakṣa saṅ anusun i saṅśaya sə̄k asusun,</l>
.<l n="b">i harəp i vuntat atambəh* iṅ iriṅan ikaṅ laga maṅkin agə̄ṅ,</l>
.<l n="c">arurək abāp asilih suduk anaivati duk-duk anūt anutuh,</l>
.<l n="d">praṅ ika kadi tulis adbhu**-ta paḍa humənəṅ juga tan paṅucap.</l>
3885 <!-- <app>*B. A. vantan tatāmə̄h iṅ.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. Lontar 100 ends here, followed by lontar 99.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.51.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">hana tiki śūra təkāmraṅ amuk amurulū praṅ ikāmurugul,</l>
3890<l n="b">ravis i raṅinya* larut kasi-kasir ika śīrṇātikəl** tinəbah,</l>
.<l n="c">inirup inambulan iṅ vataṅ avak ika tan bhraṇi timbul alot,</l>
.<l n="d">kulit i pupūnya tumūt kəna sinuduk avarṇa pulut dinudut.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. raṅanya.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. śanna kəl.</app> -->
3895</lg>
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.51.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">ikaṅ* agalah mapulih təpət amataṅa maṅkay i pāt rva təlu,</l>
.<l n="b">makabərəbəp ri harəp vəkasan apatah [h]etunikan kahala,</l>
3900<l n="c">sagila gulunya pəgat saka ri vuri chinidra sinep sinavat,</l>
.<l n="d">kadi jalatuṇḍa hilīni rudhiranika muñcar arəs aṅadəg. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. ikanaṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.
3905<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.51.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">bala patavur* paḍa śura taya juga tasak məta kiṅ kavanin,</l>
.<l n="b">atītah atambəh urudnya pasamayanikān matuluṅ masusun,</l>
.<l n="c">ḍəṅən arəbut caru rūpanika tan aṅucap surud an muruda,</l>
.<l n="d">muśala gadāṅkuśa cakra rinaməs inirupnya səḍəṅ rajahən. </l>
3910 <!-- <app>*B. A. patavu.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.51.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">tucapa tikaṅ kavənaṅ śirah ika gumələmpə̄ṅ arəs katibā,</l>
.<l n="b">cakət anahut ravis aṅgəgət inalap an aṅgrut alot dinudut,</l>
3915<l n="c">lavayanikā gumuliṅ vəkasan avuṅu kādbhuta yan paṅadəg,</l>
.<l n="d">mragagah agə̄ṅ maṅavandha kadi tan ilaṅāgra təkaṅjagani*. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. təkāṅjaśani.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.51.07" n="7">
3920<l n="a">abhavah areh makukud bala nr̥pati sunīti mahāpi murud,</l>
.<l n="b">ka*-di-kadi megha dinohakən iṅ anila saṅśaya mundur alon,</l>
.<l n="c">lumaku taman palayū kumayvapu kahilī humənəṅ** makəkəb,</l>
.<l n="d">yadukula tan vani sāhasa lumurug anūt atəgəg maṅadəg.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 99 ends here, followed by lontar 102. </app> -->
3925 <!-- <app>**B. A. huməni.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.51.08" n="8">
.<l n="a">nr̥pa cedi katon rathanira saha sārathi sāmpun adan,</l>
.<l n="b">aṅarahakən bala tuṅgul iran umabət olah akon marəka,</l>
3930<l n="c">sahana samāṅjuru rājagaṇa tumihaṅ apraṅa tan viluma,</l>
.<l n="d">kadi bañu vah gumuluṅ gaja turaga rathanya parəṅ kumucup.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.51.09" n="9">
.<l n="a">pinapagakən təkap iṅ yadukula pinagut paḍa śura masə̄,</l>
3935<l n="b">patəmunikaṅ praṅ avās baṅun acala śilān pinavantahakən,</l>
.<l n="c">prakaṭa guməntər ikaṅ dhvani kumətər avaṅsulan iṅ gagana,</l>
.<l n="d">pətəṅ avəlun-vəlun aṅjrih* i kumukus ikaṅ raṇabhūmi mələk. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. aṅrih.</app> -->
.</lg>
3940<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.51.10" n="10">
.<l n="a">haṅin-aṅiniṅ paḍa śakti kāraṇani vikāranikaṅ bhuvana,</l>
.<l n="b">kṣititala kolah ariṅguṅan avalikan umvab ikaṅ jaladhi,</l>
.<l n="c">rasa rəbahāṅ gaganogah agivaṅan ikaṅ giriśrəṅga* rubuh,</l>
.<l n="d">daśa diśi tog kumətug kadi pati ta siraṅ rəṣi deva gaṇa. </l>
3945 <!-- <app>*B. A. giraśrəṅga.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.51.11" n="11">
.<l n="a">vinuvuhan iṅ dhvaniniṅ tabə-tabəhan aṅalvaṅən alot karəṅə̄,</l>
.<l n="b">kumisik ikaṅ kala* kāhala murava mrədaṅga rəgaṅ barəbət,</l>
3950<l n="c">kumrəcik i taṅkis ikaṅ təvək amarəṅi kakrəpukiṅ palaga,</l>
.<l n="d">garəgetən aṅhrik i**-kaṅ kuda guragaḍa pāṅhrəguṅiṅ dvirada.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. bala.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. Lontar 102 ends here, followed by lontar 101.</app> -->
.</lg>
3955<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.51.12" n="12">
.<l n="a">alah inusī hiriṅan bala narapati cedi bubak malayū,</l>
.<l n="b">dhvajanika rəp-rəp avarṇa layu-layu rəbah tinətər iṅ* aṅin,</l>
.<l n="c">mapulih** ikaṅ i təṅah sama-sama sumarāmbah añar panusun,</l>
.<l n="d">kadi kulumān katəkan bañu aṅu-aṅun asraṅ anuṅsuṅakən.</l>
3960 <!-- <app>*B. A. aṅ aṅin.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. mupulih.;</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.51.13" n="13">
.<l n="a">kāraṇanikāṇḍəg ikaṅ yadubala kahalālvaṅ alah kavaluy,</l>
3965<l n="b">haru-hara kepvan ikāvrəg alulun akukud malayū ri harəp,</l>
.<l n="c">ikaṅ inahā pinakanduran apuli-pulih prasamāṅasula,</l>
.<l n="d">maṅidəki vaṅkay i rovaṅ ika vijah amaṅsəṅ amaṅsulakən.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.51.14" n="14">
3970<l n="a">mapaguta vantah ikaṅ praṅ apituvi paḍottama vīratara,</l>
.<l n="b">pracalita kombak-aṅumbakakən idəran* bhramitāṅidəri,</l>
.<l n="c">sipi-sipi kādbhuta muntab avalikan ikaṅ caturaṅga bala,</l>
.<l n="d">kadi bañuniṅ dadhi**-sāgara giri pamutər surasiddhagaṇa.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. i...ə...n.</app> -->
3975 <!-- <app>**B. A. nadi.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.
.<div type="canto" n="51" xml:id="krsnayana_01.52">
3980
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.52.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">seḍeṅniṅ yuddhān rəs amasa masilih tūb silih usi‚</l>
.<l n="b">adandan śrī cedyadhipati ruməgəp sañjatanira,</l>
.<l n="c">kadhairyan lavan krodha yatika masāṅyoga ri hati*,</l>
3985<l n="d">kaśuran rovaṅnyān padulur abhimānāṅatagakən. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. hiti.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.52.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">təlas rakvekāmuṣṭi laras i təṅah rosnya pinisit,</l>
3990<l n="b">patəhniṅ cumbi* mvaṅ** tali təguh ikān sāmpun inagag,</l>
.<l n="c">akas rosniṅ (ṅ)haste kiva pamatitis vastu tinuju,</l>
.<l n="d">prayatne tiṅkah deniṅ aṅayata hīṅan ri taliṅa.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. cuməṅi.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. Lontar 101 ends here, followed by lontar 104.</app> -->
3995</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.52.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">asove ñə̄t kumvātali* kadi tan aṅhel aməkəkā,</l>
.<l n="b">parəṅ mvaṅ maṅroccāraṇa ləpas ikaṅ hru yinuga pat,</l>
.<l n="c">kupakniṅ gandhevādbhuta kadi rebahniṅ tahən agə̄ṅ,</l>
4000<l n="d">karəs-rəs krurāvarṇa gəlap avahin maṅgyat i kapə̄.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. hə̄t kanvātali.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.52.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">aneka hrū saṅkirṇa kadi* laru-larvāsalivəran,</l>
4005<l n="b">patimbunye salvīr hatep atap iṅ ākāśa masusun,</l>
.<l n="c">larap sumamburāt** ron sumavur atatākrəp kadi hudan,</l>
.<l n="d">crəcəb cab-cab-cek-coṅ*** sama-sama jugātuṅgalan ulih.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. kada.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. A. sekəpe rat. B. sekṣe rāt.</app> -->
4010 <!-- <app>***B. A. cok.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.52.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">dudu tekaṅ māvak dahana suməkər iṅ daśa diśi,</l>
.<l n="b">murub bār bor-bor bhīṣaṇa kadi hudan handaru tibā,</l>
4015<l n="c">avrəg sakveh vr̥ṣṇyandhakabala nirāvarṇa baləman,</l>
.<l n="d">səmut Ivirnyātumpuk mati kapanasan tumpur atumaṅ.</l>
.</lg>
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.52.06" n="6">
4020<l n="a">karəs-rəs tambaynyeṅ yadukula dahat denya kahala,</l>
.<l n="b">bubak n-ton taṅ tuṅgul ri vuri kaḍavut nora maṅadəg,</l>
.<l n="c">rathātiṅgal cakranya sasisih arah tan pajamuga,</l>
.<l n="d">gajārəmpak rəṅganya kuda malayū tan paphalana.</l>
.</lg>
4025
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.52.07" n="7">
.<l n="a">kabuñcaṅ-buñcaṅ ta tabə-ta*-bəhan akveh katarival,</l>
.<l n="b">gumereñjeṅ jeṅjeṅan** ika kala goṅ kelu kaguluṅ,</l>
.<l n="c">paḍāṅhep aṅhes akarəṅ aṅucap i kumyus alayū,</l>
4030<l n="d">ikaṅ bək-bə̄kan kedəkan avədi liṅ nyāṅaḍuh ibu. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 104 ends here, followed by lontar 103.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. jejeṅan.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.52.08" n="8">
4035<l n="a">haneki vvaṅ godog* mapituturi rovaṅnya malayū,</l>
.<l n="b">alah bhoh tāṅher tan mati kətika yan tan təkanikā,</l>
.<l n="c">prasiddhekāpūrvākrəta ya ta panəṅkə̄ pati hurip,</l>
.<l n="d">rikānəkəkū meh-meh kagalah atəhər lumpat anikus. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. godeg.</app> -->
4040</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.52.09" n="9">
.<l n="a">kunaṅ saṅ śūra kṣatriya sahana vr̥ṣṇyandhakakula,</l>
.<l n="b">ahə̄m śūraṅher aptyapuliha tuvin sāmpun atitah,</l>
.<l n="c">aṅantyājñā śrī karṣaṇa vəkasan aṅkatnya gumuluṅ,</l>
4045<l n="d">baṅun siṅhārāmpak prasama kumucup* tan patahənan. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. kumucus.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.52.10" n="10">
.<l n="a">parəṅ lāvan kr̥ṣṇāgraja makasahāya ṅ para ratu,</l>
4050<l n="b">ikaṅ konta mvaṅ daṇḍa muṣala halādbhuta maṅəne,</l>
.<l n="c">lāvan tekaṅ sambartta ṅaran ikanaṅ laṅgala vəsi,</l>
.<l n="d">agantyāsraṅ təmpuhnya saka ri taṅan śrī haladhara.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.52.11" n="11">
4055<l n="a">rikā tonton praṅniṅ yadukula tan orāṅgaləṅ amūk,</l>
.<l n="b">kataṅkis tekaṅ cedibala kavaluy kabvaṅ alayū,</l>
.<l n="c">katūb kedran tan vriṅ parananika kevran malulunan,</l>
.<l n="d">baṅun vveniṅ gaṅgāṅrəs amagut i tambiṅniṅ acala*. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 103 ends here, followed by lontar 106.</app> -->
4060</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.52.12" n="12">
.<l n="a">ikaṅ rajā sāmanta pəjah ananā Ivir*nya kavarṇa,</l>
.<l n="b">matiṇḍih mvaṅ vadvanya makasulayah Ivir**nya maturū,</l>
.<l n="c">hanan mātyaṅlah-lah saha makuṭa lāvan vadva juru kveh***,</l>
4065<l n="d">dudū miṅsər-miṅsər**** maṅusir-usir ahyun mahuripa.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. A. lvir. B. lvaṅ. a. B. nya kavenaṅ.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. AB. lvi.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***S. AB. jurukuh.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>****S. AB. miṅsar-miṅsar.</app> -->
4070</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.52.13" n="13">
.<l n="a">jarāsandhāṅantī hiriṅan atəguh pugəran aṅadeg,</l>
.<l n="b">matambak tan liṅgar* vekasan apagəh tan kapalayū,</l>
.<l n="c">cinakrāñakra krūra tinuhuk ahur-huran anuhuk,</l>
4075<l n="d">dinūk riṅ kontā tomara maləs aṅontāsraṅ amanah. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. liṅga.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.52.14" n="14">
.<l n="a">paḍotpataṅ śastrojvala ləpas iṅ ākāśa kumisik,</l>
4080<l n="b">karəs-res prodbhutāṅdadi hudan aseduṅ* halivavar,</l>
.<l n="c">hanan pāvak nāgākr̥ti malad-alad Ivir hudan apuy,</l>
.<l n="d">maṅap ṅak-ṅak-ṅak śabdanika masavaṅ haṅsa matukar.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. asedu.</app> -->
.</lg>
4085<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.52.15" n="15">
.<l n="a">dudū taṅ śailādriśikharanika kīrṅānaravata,</l>
.<l n="b">gləmpəṅ gək-gər śabdanika tumibāṅ riṅ kṣititala,</l>
.<l n="c">prəpet car-car laris i ləpasiṅ cakra madulur,</l>
.<l n="d">kəpuk-pyak-pyak-pon prakaṭa patakisniṅ paḍa gadā. </l>
4090 <!-- <app>c B. prəpət cacar laris.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.52.16" n="16">
.<l n="a">samaṅkā tekaṅ praṅ maparimita tan paṅən-aṅənan,</l>
.<l n="b">baṅun syūha Ivirniṅ tribhuvana savetnyan haru-hara,</l>
4095<l n="c">kadi praṅniṅ devāpuri ri təkaniṅ tārakāsura* </l>
.<l n="d">ri kāla hyaṅ saṅghā suravara kumārāmara jaya. </l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. kārakamaya.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.52.17" n="17">
4100<l n="a">ikaṅ gā*-gak lumreṅ gagana sumahab ri təga-təgal,</l>
.<l n="b">hanān kāvrəg deniṅ surak akətəran rəp təka muvah,</l>
.<l n="c">ikaṅ hasvāsaṅ sə̄h ryyalas-alas ikaṅ papraṅan arəs,</l>
.<l n="d">aṅun və̄k rūpanyāguyaṅ i lariniṅ rah kadi latək. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 106 ends here, followed by lontar 105.</app> -->
4105</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.52.18" n="18">
.<l n="a">kəpuh rūg raṅrə sol riṅ təṅahiṅ təgalni pabharatan,</l>
.<l n="b">baṅun kayvāvoh vvaṅ vinilət iṅ usus varṇa calulil*,</l>
.<l n="c">ibək hrū pāṅ ya trus matap** amulu laṇḍak tumap atap,</l>
4110<l n="d">cacah cūrṇa crah carmanika təkapiṅ cakra luməpas.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. valulil.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. AB. mapap.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.52.19" n="19">
4115<l n="a">kapiṅ pāt piṅ nem taṅ laga sama-samātumpəkan arəs,</l>
.<l n="b">paḍālvaṅ mevvīvvārvuda bala mahāśūra niyuta,</l>
.<l n="c">avantvaṅ rah Ivir vah galuga kadi duhniṅ bayəm abāṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">savaṅ kokohniṅ mṛtyu karamə-raməs varṇa cinarub.</l>
.</lg>
4120<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.52.20" n="20">
.<l n="a">ikaṅ mapraṅ riṅ toya rudhira wijah rāmya cacaban,</l>
.<l n="b">kasaṇḍut lumpatnyeṅ usus avilətan molih i suku,</l>
.<l n="c">ḍaḍapnyābaṅ maṅkin kadi laka mirahnyārddha tuməṅu,</l>
.<l n="d">ravisnyākrām luṅsir putih atəmahan varṇa katirah.</l>
4125</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.52.21" n="21">
.<l n="a">hanāpraṅ riṅ rəṅgātiśaya kahalepnyan pada pəjah,</l>
.<l n="b">nihan ton-ton mātaṅganika patukarnyan paḍa gajah,</l>
.<l n="c">marək mundur karvāpəluk apulir olih silih uləṅ,</l>
4130<l n="d">silih sob-sob rikaṅ gaḍiṅ akiḍupū Ivir uḍik-uḍik*. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 105 ends here, followed by lontar 108.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.52.22" n="22">
.<l n="a">pravīrasra[ṅ] muṅgviṅ turaga tahu teṅ aśva samaya,</l>
4135<l n="b">arundək təg-təg-təg mapalaga ləṅən śīrna pinatrəm,</l>
.<l n="c">tinon ta saṅke rəṅga pinara-parah tan vavareṅə̄h,</l>
.<l n="d">lumumpat colot seṅgita kudanikā moliha rəpat.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.52.23" n="23">
4140<l n="a">nda nāhan ta matta dvirada səḍəṅ olih vvaṅ aṅadəg,</l>
.<l n="b">pakətəp ḍə̄hat ndan gaməl i takuraṅnye tulalayan,</l>
.<l n="c">təlas pendeṅnyāndul kinuliliṅakən yvenuyəṅ-uyəṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">munī pə̄ṅ-pə̄ṅ-bə̄ṅ tulya vusu-vusu yan kadrəsan aṅin.</l>
.</lg>
4145<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.52.24" n="24">
.<l n="a">titih sor vadvā cedipati sapataṅkəpnya kahala,</l>
.<l n="b">ləvih saṅke Ivaṅniṅ yadubala vilaṅnyāṅdaśaguṇa,</l>
.<l n="c">gajah vaṅkainya varṇa pinupulakən sə̄h anarasah,</l>
.<l n="d">ḍavət lvirnyātumpuk gila-gila kasātan kapanasan.</l>
4150</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="52" xml:id="krsnayana_01.53">
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.53.01" n="1">
4155<l n="a">ndan śrī rukma səḍəṅnirāpraṅ umusir ṅgvan saṅ surendrānuja,</l>
.<l n="b">sakvehniṅ bala bhr̥tya rājagaṇa len mantri rikaṅ kuṇḍina,</l>
.<l n="c">yeka rakva sahāja saṅ nr̥patiputrātyanta riṅ sañjata,</l>
.<l n="d">nāhan saṅ śrutabāṇa mukhyanika len saṅ dakṣiṇāryyāṅśumān*.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. dakṣanāryaṅśuman.</app> -->
4160</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.53.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">sākṣāt bvat haji kapva maṅləpasakən bajrādicakrāyudha,</l>
.<l n="b">len saṅke hiriṅan marāmpak umusī kr̥ṣṇa nda tan saṅśaya,</l>
.<l n="c">tan kevran inudan-hudan kinasut iṅ sarvāstra norāṅəne,</l>
4165<l n="d">tan pendah ravi katruhan makalaṅan maṅki*-n sutejāhaləp. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 108 ends here, followed by lontar 107.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.53.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">aṅhiṅ bhīṣmakaputra sāmpun atihaṅ māyat mamənṭaṅ laras,</l>
4170<l n="b">ndā muṅgviṅ ratha rəṅga saṅśaya marək tan paṅgalə[ṅ] niścaya,</l>
.<l n="c">maṅkin krodha magə̄ṅ ri saṅ nr̥pati kr̥ṣṇān ton lavan rukmiṇī,</l>
.<l n="d">śakṣāt rāhu harəp rumoha mulat iṅ suryāpupul mvaṅ vulan.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.53.04" n="4">
4175<l n="a">mojar hāh kamu kr̥ṣṇa tan sipi durācārāmapas kṣatriya,</l>
.<l n="b">ndah yekiṅ ratu cora duryaśa nikin tan soṅ sinaṅgah prabhu,</l>
.<l n="c">tan pūrvārṇa huvus vinehan inak āmbək de mahāsajjana,</l>
.<l n="d">molih byakta pañidraniṅ kujana yan ri vvaṅ masih parcaya.</l>
.</lg>
4180<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.53.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">koṅ tañjrih kajanāpavāda jinajākən riṅ jagad durjana,</l>
.<l n="b">āmbək bhaṅga kamun samaṅhinakne buddhinya tan paṅgaləṅ,</l>
.<l n="c">ndā tan vruh riṅ ayogya-yogya juga liṅtāsiṅ samaṅde sukha,</l>
.<l n="d">dhik praṅvaktra kaṭuṅka luṇṭa kuṭilādoh də̄h adoh kottaman.</l>
4185</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.53.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">o saṅ rukma hənəṅ* saṅ ārya sakarəṅ paṅher ta-gantyāṅucap,</l>
.<l n="b">sāmpun vruh ṅvaṅ ikaṅ kaduhkha ri valatni ṅvaṅ ri saṅ rukmiṇī,</l>
.<l n="c">āpan kenakan iṅ rarālaki kayogyanyān təmən somahən,</l>
4190<l n="d">tan maṅkā rasikenalapku sahasā ṅvaṅ solahiṅ tan vədi. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. maheneṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.53.07" n="7">
.<l n="a">yan vvaṅ thāni makarma tan pavuvusənkvāpan samanyātəmu,</l>
4195<l n="b">vetniṅ janma sugih pradhāna ya panumbasnyeṅ maṇik mās pirak*,</l>
.<l n="c">ācārya pva bhujaṅga yogya tarimānātah kapantəsnikā,</l>
.<l n="d">yan bvat kṣatriyajanma vīrya panukunya śūra maṅgāpraṅa. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 107 ends here, followed by lontar 110.</app> -->
.</lg>
4200<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.53.08" n="8">
.<l n="a">polahkviki yatkākramāpa karaṇanyān səṅgahən duryaśa,</l>
.<l n="b">dūrātiṅgala yan kaharṣani manahnyan yogya kədvākna,</l>
.<l n="c">ton taṅ siṅha mr̥gendra molih amaṅan burvan kənas ndan dəmak,</l>
.<l n="d">ndi n maṅgāla panaṅgrahā ya ta hinūrnyān mātya molih paṅan.</l>
4205</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.53.09" n="9">
.<l n="a">nāhan śabda janārddananə[m] puh iri krodhā narendrātmaja,</l>
.<l n="b">madəg bajranikaṅ mukhāməsi tuñu Ivirnya mirah kātara,</l>
.<l n="c">kadyāvətva kukus lavan latu-latu prodbhuta bāṅniṅ mata,</l>
4210<l n="d">uśvāsāṅububan mijil panas ikaṅ bahnī daləm tvasnira.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.53.10" n="10">
.<l n="a">sumyuk taṅ caduśakti* bāṇa pamanah śrī rukma rīndrānuja**,</l>
.</lg>
4215<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.53.11" n="10">
.<l n="a">hru śaktyādi nəmaṅpuluh pat asusun Ivir arddhacandrāluṅid,</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.53.12" n="10">
.<l n="a">abhrā muntab urubnikaṅ hada-hadā riṅ byoma kaləran kilat,</l>
4220</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.53.13" n="10">
.<l n="a">ndā-ndā nora gaman tan iṅ luputa denyāpan prakīrṇeṅ raṇa.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. caduṣaṣṭi.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. rīndānuja.</app> -->
4225</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.53.14" n="11">
.<l n="a">meh-meh prāpta tumampuhe nr̥pati kr̥ṣṇādrəs larinyālaris,</l>
.<l n="b">vāgyūtpata saha prahara kumisik himpər surakniṅ tasik,</l>
.<l n="c">ndah vyarthān katulak śināpa pinapag riṅ yogasarā kṣaṇa,</l>
4230<l n="d">mukṣāvarṇa hudan mulih tan asuve rəp sākṣanālyus hilaṅ. </l>
. <!-- <app>c B. riṅ yoga saṅ rākṣana.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="53" xml:id="krsnayana_01.54">
4235
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.54.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">śrī kr̥ṣṇa duhkhita masəṅhi*-t an aṅlarāmbək,</l>
.<l n="b">ndan purvakānumata buddhinirānumoda,</l>
.<l n="c">maṅke pva saṅ nr̥patiputra təkāvamāna,</l>
4240<l n="d">nāhan ta kāraṇani buddhinirābhimāna.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 110 ends here, followed by lontar 109.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.54.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">bvat rājaśāsana təmən-təmən āga mokta,</l>
4245<l n="b">tan pāpakarma riṅ amātyani vandhuvarga,</l>
.<l n="c">vvaṅ śānaka pituvi rakva satiṅkahanya,</l>
.<l n="d">yan vighna pāvak ika vādhaka riṅ svakārya.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.54.03" n="3">
4250<l n="a">ndan maṅkanāṅən-aṅen ārya janārddane tvas,</l>
.<l n="b">śīghrāṅayat laras apūrva vijilnikaṅ hrū,</l>
.<l n="c">akveh pituṅpuluh atap yugapab ləpasnya,</l>
.<l n="d">kapvāṅəne satinujunya babak bubak mur.</l>
. <!-- <app>c. B. yugapat.</app> -->
4255</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.54.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">kolāhala n kahala rukma balā halvaṅ,</l>
.<l n="b">norāpulih-pulih aləh lalu tan panolih,</l>
.<l n="c">kīrṇaṅ kanin kəna kaniṣṭha kənas paḍanya,</l>
4260<l n="d">saṅsāra śīrṇa mari śūra musīr uripnya.</l>
. <!-- <app>b. B. aləh lilu tan.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.54.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">honyā haneṅ ratha tumiṅgalakən rathanya,</l>
4265<l n="b">len taṅ haneṅ kuda tumiṅgalakən kudanya,</l>
.<l n="c">ton taṅ ḍavuh kabərəbəp saka riṅ* gajendra,</l>
.<l n="d">maṅgəh tibā manuk avarṇa tibādhibhraṣṭa. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. sakeṅ gajendra.</app> -->
.</lg>
4270<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.54.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">mantrī tigaṅ sikinirarthaka tan pasāra,</l>
.<l n="b">saṅ dakṣiṇārya kalavan śrutabāṇa kabvaṅ,</l>
.<l n="c">kapvālayū paḍa tan eṅhət i sañjatanya,</l>
.<l n="d">len aṅśumān kavənəsan milu tan pateja.</l>
4275</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.54.07" n="7">
.<l n="a">ṅhiṅ saṅ narendratanayāṅgəgə̄ riṅ raṇāṅgga,</l>
.<l n="b">tan kelu kontab aṅadəg mulat iṅ balāvrəg,</l>
.<l n="c">krūrā*-ṅgətəm nəhər amuṣṭi laras lavan hrū,</l>
4280<l n="d">bvat dhīra nirbhaya kaśūran irāṅaveṣa.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 109 ends here, followed by lontar 112.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.54.08" n="8">
.<l n="a">krodhādhikāṅləpasakən* panah adbhutākrəp,</l>
4285<l n="b">sār sək svaranya kadi cāmara kaprahāran,</l>
.<l n="c">ndā tan padon təkanikā ri narārya kr̥ṣṇa,</l>
.<l n="d">Ivir larva-larvan aṅasut hurubiṅ pradīpa. </l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. krodhādhikā ləpasakən.</app> -->
.</lg>
4290<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.54.09" n="9">
.<l n="a">ndan vyartha siṅ paṅavaghāta narendraputra,</l>
.<l n="b">āmbəknirāsrəṅ atirodra təvas kaṅelan,</l>
.<l n="c">piṅpāt piṅlima panahnira tan pamandi,</l>
.<l n="d">lvir klīva niṣphalanikaṅ ləkas apravr̥tti.</l>
4295</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.54.10" n="10">
.<l n="a">śrīndrānujānəməni tiṅkah i denirāpraṅ,</l>
.<l n="b">sakrodha maləpasakən śara divyaśakti,</l>
.<l n="c">sāmpun tinatva saha yoga təlas minantran,</l>
4300<l n="d">ndan saniścayanire kənaniṅ kinārya. </l>
. <!-- <app>d. B. ekan saniscaya.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.54.11" n="11">
.<l n="a">tampuhnikaṅ śara sake laras ārya kr̥ṣṇa,</l>
4305<l n="b">tan dvāṅəne śakaṭa saṅ nr̥paputra śīrṇa,</l>
.<l n="c">syuh ratnarəṅganika śīrṇa katampək iṅ hrū,</l>
.<l n="d">ton sarathinya kəna māti lavan kudanya.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.54.12" n="12">
4310<l n="a">saṅkeṅ rathā nr̥patiputra tibā katumpək,</l>
.<l n="b">rəmpu tikaṅ makuṭa mukṣa məsat maṇiknya,</l>
.<l n="c">lāvan larasnirātugel pinəgat riṅ astra,</l>
.<l n="d">meh mātya cittanira nora huvus vitā de.</l>
.</lg>
4315<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.54.13" n="13">
.<l n="a">śrī rukmiṇī mulat i saṅ kaka mār ikaṅ tvas,</l>
.<l n="b">akrak nəhər məkuli jə̄ṅ naranātha kr̥ṣṇa,</l>
.<l n="c">tan vriṅ hiraṅ maṅəsəsan sira yan tuməṅhā,</l>
.<l n="d">ṅkāne pupūnira narendra hi*-linikaṅ lūh.</l>
4320 <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 112 ends here, followed by lontar 111.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.54.14" n="14">
.<l n="a">rambut mure karakət iṅ vadanāmələs amvas,</l>
.<l n="b">membəh raras kətə-kətəg ri jajāpalayvan,</l>
4325<l n="c">kosap tapihnira lukar kavadal kaluṅsur,</l>
.<l n="d">lāgyākədal-kedal anaṅhis asamba-sambat*. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. anaṅhiṅ sasamba-sambat.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
4330<div type="canto" n="54" xml:id="krsnayana_01.55">
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.55.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">hāh-hāh kr̥ṣṇa prabhu kita ya tah saṅ pramāṇe huripku,</l>
.<l n="b">saṅ sākṣāt jīva maṅəmit uripkvīki tan len dadinta,</l>
4335<l n="c">saṅ lagīniṣṭi* tumulusa masih rumakṣe tuvuhku,</l>
.<l n="d">sambegante ṅhulun inagəm i citta pinrih minuṣṭi.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. lāgi niṣṭa.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.55.02" n="2">
4340<l n="a">maṅken povah tumuluy atilar* buddhi saṅ śrī narendra,</l>
.<l n="b">atyanteṅ nirghr̥ṇa tan avəlas riṅ hulun hīnapuṇya,</l>
.<l n="c">vruhkun tan hantusa nr̥pati siṅgih kəta** yan katuhvan,</l>
.<l n="d">ṅvaṅ yveraṅ maṅhamu-hamu rijə̄[ṅ] tālpadharmānukər*** yya.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. atila.</app> -->
4345 <!-- <app>**B. A. təkā.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. A. tālpadharmānukər yya.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.55.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">āpan deniṅ kavava ri kitāṅaśraya rī pādukanta*,</l>
4350<l n="b">vīryantāgə̄ṅ paṅayat-ayataṅhə̄bane vandhuvarga,</l>
.<l n="c">ndā tan maṅkāṅhuluy i larapanta n senusir** sanmatanta,</l>
.<l n="d">lvir pāṅniṅ candana vinilət iṅ sarppa heman rənəbnya.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. A. yopādutanta. B. yopādukanta.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. sanusir.</app> -->
4355</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.55.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">śrī rukmātyanta sih ira rikāne hanaṅkvīṅ bapebu,</l>
.<l n="b">sākṣāt praṇa pituvi sira sānak təmən tan papaṅrva*,</l>
.<l n="c">maṅke pvan pātyana ri harəp i ṅvaṅ təkap śrī narendra,</l>
4360<l n="d">ndī tan marmāṅrəsa ṅ umulatāṅlampva tan** tonən iṅvaṅ.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. parərvā.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. AB. yan.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.55.05" n="5">
4365<l n="a">hāh-āh rukma ṅku kaka mapa tolahta maṅkā saṅ ā*-rya,</l>
.<l n="b">atyante kuṅ** lara katəmu dentāpa kadī tan iṅ rāt,</l>
.<l n="c">aum*** paṅlampvata kaka mapa ta deniṅ tumambāna duhkha,</l>
.<l n="d">ndīṅvaṅ vānyaṅhuripa ri kitāpan katuhvan sadoṣa.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 111 ends here, followed by lontar 114.</app> -->
4370 <!-- <app>**B. A. ku.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. A. apa.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.55.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">maṅken maṅgā humalaṅakna prāṇa tan vədya mātya,</l>
4375<l n="b">ndī tan pareṅ hari əvək ira śrī mahārāja kr̥ṣṇa,</l>
.<l n="c">yogyan yān mapakəna ya silīdirya donkvīki maṅke,</l>
.<l n="d">deniṅ tvaṅ marma tan alaṅ-alaṅ sih vəlaskvī gatinta.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.55.07" n="7">
4380<l n="a">ndan aṅde pūrvar̥na ri hatiṅkvānusuk mār kasəṅkvan,</l>
.<l n="b">ṅūni paṅrākṣa kita śaraṇaniṅ puṇya jīvaṅku sākṣāt,</l>
.<l n="c">maṅke pva ṅvaṅ gumavay i halantāmaṅun duhkha rakryan,</l>
.<l n="d">ndī ṅvaṅ kr̥ṣṇāṅhuripaku* hirānta n tumūte patinta.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. kr̥ṣṇeṅ huripaku.</app> -->
4385 <!-- <app>d. The meaning of the word hir ’het neervallen, overstelpen’ given by J on p.669 fits perfectly in the context.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.55.08" n="8">
.<l n="a">āpan yadyan mahuripa katon tan hanānyāśrayaṅku,</l>
.<l n="b">byaktekin tan kaharəpana yan mantukeṅ rāma-r̥na </l>
4390<l n="c">sakveh-kvehniṅ kadaṅ iṅ apa yan liṅa ri ṅvaṅ pinucca,</l>
.<l n="d">ndī ṅvaṅ ndī n deśa masiha pakārinta tan vriṅ parāna.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.55.09" n="9">
.<l n="a">yan mūrāṅdoha musira vukir pājaran pārśvaśūnya,</l>
4395<l n="b">ndā tan vruh ṅvaṅ lumaku riṅ alas tan vənaṅ riṅ lapāṅlih,</l>
.<l n="c">icchākun mātya juga kaka maṅke katone harəpta,</l>
.<l n="d">piṅ saptāṅjanma manə-manəhantāku tan sah ri rakryan.</l>
.</lg>
.</div>
4400<div type="canto" n="55" xml:id="krsnayana_01.56">
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.56.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">marmma tvas basudevaputra ruməṅə̄ ri panaṅis ira rājaputrikā,</l>
.<l n="b">ndah* śīghrān pasalah laras vavaṅ amaṅkvakna** təəhər aṅol kataṅgama,</l>
4405<l n="c">goṅniṅ krodhanire narendrasuta rukma sinapihan i sih nirāpriyā,</l>
.<l n="d">tan pendah kadi bahni yajña dumilah paḍəm urub ika sinyukan madhu.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 114 ends here, followed by lontar 113.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. apaṅkvakna.</app> -->
.</lg>
4410<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.56.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">ndan śrī bhīṣmakaputra vāhu maṅhəbaṅ-həbaṅ avuṅu tuhun kamānuṣan,</l>
.<l n="b">āpan mati hiḍəpnirerikaṅ avak manəmu hurip avarṇa mār baṅun,</l>
.<l n="c">ndān ika* tan vənaṅ onək iṅ tvas anətək lagi miṅəl anəsəl purākr̥ta,</l>
.<l n="d">āśā maṅən-aṅən ri tiṅkahanira mvaṅ irikaṅ ulah anuṅ enaka. </l>
4415 <!-- <app>*S. AB. ikə tan.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>c. anəsəl purakr̥ta ([as he felt] sorry for bis past deeds). Z.2.1451 renders purākr̥ta with’ deeds of a former life’. No entry from K.Y. This phrase is derived from the story when Prince Rukma is lying on the ground after being beaten in combat by King Kr̥ṣṇa. He remembers all his boastful words about his desire to kill King Kr̥sna and bring back Princess Rukmiṇī to kuṇḍina and also his promise not to return to kuṇḍina if he fails to do so. Nothing refers to deeds from a former life. This does not imply that the meaning given in Z. is incorrect, only not applicable here.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.56.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">āpan liṅ ira ṅūni tan valuya riṅ svanagara luputiṅ janārddana,</l>
4420<l n="b">yan tan kalapa rukmiṇī muvah ika vacananira sinakṣyan iṅ yayah,</l>
.<l n="c">maṅken bhagna taman surud sira ri sojar ira niyata tan paṅisyani,</l>
.<l n="d">nāhan kāraṇaniṅ tan antuka ri kuṇḍina magavaya rājyamaṇḍala. </l>
. <!-- <app>a. B. nira ṅūni.</app> -->
.</lg>
4425<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.56.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">ndan śrīndrānuja rakva lālana manahnira ri təlas i rāmarājaya,</l>
.<l n="b">vadva cedi lavan vatək magadha śīrṇa pinaravaśaniṅ vatək yadu,</l>
.<l n="c">ndah maṅgəh saka marga saṅ nr̥pati tan hana mara katahan panaṅśaya,</l>
.<l n="d">ṅhiṅ ri dvāravatī pinakṣanira tan saha saṅ ahayu rājaputrikā.</l>
4430</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.56.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">ṅkāne rəṅganikaṅ rathānaruka rāmyaniṅ aṅarasi rum-rumniṅ pipi,</l>
.<l n="b">kanakhārṣaṇa* cumbanādi kinənaknira sinəpuhan karasika**-n,</l>
.<l n="c">ṅhiṅ*** rābasyana rasminiṅ gati turut katinuna puputnya hinərətan,</l>
4435<l n="d">āpan yan ḍatəṅ iṅ kaḍatvan irikā ləkas amaṅuna rājasaṅgama.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. kanyākarṣaṇa.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. Lontar 113 ends here, followed by lontar 116.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. A. ṅhi.</app> -->
.</lg>
4440<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.56.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">ndan marmāsiha ri* saṅ antən** araras riṅ ulah-ulah aṅambvakən laṅə̄,</l>
.<l n="b">moghatə̄n amibik tapih tumiru deniṅ aṅamər arāmibik pupus,</l>
.<l n="c">pantəs yan paṅayun gəluṅ vahu lukar baṅun aṅuyuni luṅgahiṅ gaḍuṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">kadyaṅgo susuh aṅgagap kaparək iṅ susu sira pati jumpu-jumputi.</l>
4445 <!-- <app>*S. AB. re.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. intən.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.56.07" n="7">
.<l n="a">ndan saṅ śrī vara rukmiṇī sira glanāsmu sumə̄ṅ kamanuṣan,</l>
4450<l n="b">gə̄ṅ tr̥ṣṇaniṅ arāma-rena makakāṅhuluy i hatinirāmiraṅrvaṅi,</l>
.<l n="c">ken kadyaṅavarā ri saṅ nr̥pati kr̥ṣṇa mimul-īmul iṅ āmbək iṅ rimaṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">saṅ sinivī sira miṅsər enəh apupul-pupul hinura paṅkva-paṅkvana.</l>
.</lg>
.</div>
4455<div type="canto" n="56" xml:id="krsnayana_01.57">
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.57.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">byatītan rāmyanirān sukha mārgga,</l>
.<l n="b">ndah prāpteṅ dvāravatī sakamantyan,</l>
4460<l n="c">sakvehniṅ bhr̥tya kabeh yadu vr̥ṣṇi,</l>
.<l n="d">asraṅ muṅsir gr̥ha rakva paḍāgya.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.57.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">ton taṅ sa-dvāravatī paḍa garva,</l>
4465<l n="b">usik vah tuṣṭa sagorava harṣa,</l>
.<l n="c">pan sāmpun śrī naranātha jayeṅ praṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">tovin molih rara ratna viśeṣa.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.57.03" n="3">
4470<l n="a">liṅniṅ strīyagoṣṭi paḍāsraṅ aśabda,</l>
.<l n="b">śrī nāthātyanta sabhāgyan akarma,</l>
.<l n="c">ndan moghātah tulusāsih asātmyā,</l>
.<l n="d">śrī devī rukmiṇī meṅgal aputra*. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 116 ends here, followed by lontar 115.</app> -->
4475</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.57.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">luṅha pvekaṅ dina ratri gumanti,</l>
.<l n="b">maṅkin maṅgəh sukhaniṅ yadu vr̥ṣṇi,</l>
.<l n="c">norāṅde śoka kasaṅśaya riṅ tvas,</l>
4480<l n="d">aṅhiṅ paṅhvat rasa bhoga bhinukti.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.57.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">ndan saṅ śrī kr̥ṣṇa lavan sira devi,</l>
.<l n="b">muktī śr̥ṅgāra laṅə̄niṅ* asaṇḍiṅ,</l>
4485<l n="c">ekānte citta sarāga saraśmi,</l>
.<l n="d">tan bheda hyaṅ rati kāma sadr̥ṣṭi**.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. laṅuniṅ.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. AB. sanr̥ṣṭi.</app> -->
.</lg>
4490</div>
.<div type="canto" n="57" xml:id="krsnayana_01.58">
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.58.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">taṅeh yadin vuvusən ikāṅ ulah kabeh,</l>
4495<l n="b">nihan ta saṅ rva kəñəp aṅanti ri tilam,</l>
.<l n="c">paḍālabuh turida lulut rinatākən,</l>
.<l n="d">avās ikā baṅun uvat iṅ tape vuruṅ.</l>
. <!-- <app>d. J renders uvad by ’worde uitgetrokken’ (pulled out, withdrawn), whilst Z. 2.2156 translates uvat into ’medicine, remedy’. I am of the view, that uvat is derived from vad (to speak). From here the meanings ’pledge, vow, intention’ are deduced.</app> -->
.</lg>
4500<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.58.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">putus narendra mara rikana kottama,</l>
.<l n="b">ikaṅ gave kayu kaharəpnireṅ daṅū,</l>
.<l n="c">haneṅ jinəm jənək irikāṅulah solah,</l>
.<l n="d">savaṅ vutāsriṅ ulah irān salah kəna.</l>
4505</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="58" xml:id="krsnayana_01.59">
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.59.01" n="1">
4510<l n="a">kaluṅhā pvekaṅ kāla pakurən irākumə[t]* tan ucapən,</l>
.<l n="b">hunəṅ riṅ kavvitan hilaṅ inadəh iṅ sihniṅ asənəṅ,</l>
.<l n="c">pitovi n māri ṅke mur i ləṅə̄ṅ ikaṅ rājya racana**,</l>
.<l n="d">apan sarvendah kādbhuta kadi laṅə̄niṅ surasabhā.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. irokumə.</app> -->
4515 <!-- <app>**B. A. rājya ceda.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.59.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">hana bvat gandharvvārjja nagara gr̥hāsimpən inapi,</l>
.<l n="b">parəmpvan dantāśri vaṅunan ika kīrṇokir-ukiran,</l>
4520<l n="c">tulis māsnye apyāyana tuvi hañar vāhu vinəḍar,</l>
.<l n="d">mahūr-hūran luṅniṅ katirah i tətə̄nyāṅayuh usuk.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.59.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">rika ṅgvan śrī nareśvara nr̥pasutāṅālihi lulut,</l>
4525<l n="b">amə̄m rāgāśr̥ṅgāra raras i laṅə̄niṅ silih-asih,</l>
.<l n="c">nda ma*-muktya sarvendriya pamaripūjāhyaṅ atanu,</l>
.<l n="d">varahniṅ pradyumnāgama rinəgəp iṅ citta ginegə̄.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 115 ends here, followed by lontar 118.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>d. In the Krəṣṇāyana kakavin, Pradyumna is said to be the incarnation of the God of Love (Smara, Kāma, Manmatha etc). So the book called Pradyumnāgama is none other than the Smarāgama or Kāmasutra.</app> -->
4530</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.59.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">katuhvan ndin tan sekaturida same rupa savava,</l>
.<l n="b">ika graṅ-gra[ṅ] rāgāṅhuluya kalapan tan tahu mijil,</l>
.<l n="c">marma darpākarvān uləs akukub* i jro pakasutan,</l>
4535<l n="d">mavās taṅ kaña** kadyati mūr ulah irāpan hariṅətən.</l>
. <!-- <app>c. B. mapa darpa...</app> -->
. <!-- <app>*B. A. akukuña.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. AB. taṅ kañ...</app> -->
.</lg>
4540<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.59.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">syapa vvaṅ tan harṣān mulat i sira rāmyāsih akurən,</l>
.<l n="b">padārūm arja n vajik atis avor candana miṅiṅ,</l>
.<l n="c">rəsəp tan lambāvarṇa satu paṅinum vve manis ira,</l>
.<l n="d">lanā tan sah sekātmaka kadi tahapniṅ gula śuci.</l>
4545</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.59.06" n="6">
.<l n="a">taṅeh yan varṇan solah iṅ aṅalihi* prāṇa sahati,</l>
.<l n="b">hanan līlālīlāməṅ-aməṅ umareṅ** taman adulur,</l>
.<l n="c">mahas kārvān i sənət*** laku-lakuniṅ icchālari-lari,</l>
4550<l n="d">ikāmet paṇḍan iṅ rantunan aṅuha rūm-rūmiṅ ulah.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. A. aṅalih prāna.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. uməreṅ.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***S AB. i sənis.</app> -->
.</lg>
4555<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.59.07" n="7">
.<l n="a">tuvin śobhāmrikniṅ upavana pənuhnya sakalaṅə̄n,</l>
.<l n="b">sake groṅan vve nyaṅ vukir-anak atūs trāsa malahar,</l>
.<l n="c">ri piṅgir-piṅgirnyāvatu-vatu pasir sə̄h rinacana,</l>
.<l n="d">həniṅ*nyārum kaləran sari surabhi kadyāhavu-havu. </l>
4560 <!-- <app>*S. AB. hənəṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.59.08" n="7">
.<l n="a">ikaṅ tīrtha lvir strī bañunika katon śuddha mahili,</l>
.<l n="b">ləvəs riṅ drəs hyun-hyun ri təpi kulumanyāṅicir-icir,</l>
4565<l n="c">susuhnyātuntun svaṅ sa*-lahiḍep asoṅsoṅ vatu mirah,</l>
.<l n="d">mahālon-lonan yan lumaku-laku lāgyāṅurəd-urəd. </l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 118 ends here, followed by lontar 117.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.59.09" n="9">
4570<l n="a">haneki prasādārəcəp apacirāpañcuran aho,</l>
.<l n="b">asaṇḍiṅ səñjaṅnya analaga hibəkan sarvakusuma,</l>
.<l n="c">aśoka mvaṅ punnāga pāṅ ika paḍāghasa maharas,</l>
.<l n="d">aket vvadnyāḍimpit kadi paməkuliṅ vvaṅ garəgətən.</l>
.</lg>
4575<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.59.10" n="10">
.<l n="a">ikaṅ paṇḍan rambat ri təpi-təpiniṅ tāṭaka ləṅə̄,</l>
.<l n="b">katon vitnya grət-grət satəṅahiṅ ahambən linukaran,</l>
.<l n="c">puḍaknya rva parṇah sumalah aniput riṅ* vatu karaṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">rarasnyāṅde marmāniru-niru vətisniṅ kinisapu.</l>
4580 <!-- <app>*B. A. nya rāparṇah sumilak i putəriṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.59.11" n="11">
.<l n="a">rikā taṅ tāman Ivir maru-maruni saṅ śrī nr̥pasutā,</l>
.<l n="b">lanāṅumbaṅ taṅ tavvan anaṅis i sāryāṅisək-isək,</l>
4585<l n="c">hulərnyāgantuṅ riṅ tarətəpan anis tan hana mulat,</l>
.<l n="d">sĕmutnyeṅ səñjaṅ* kasyasih alabuhe riṅ pabuhayan. </l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. səntaṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.59.12" n="12">
4590<l n="a">kanah vetan raṅkaṅ patani minahā śūnya kasənət,</l>
.<l n="b">səkarniṅ handul jrah ri havan ika sə̄h sāri rumarab,</l>
.<l n="c">laṅə̄niṅ tañjuṅ muṅgvi natar ika saśrī pinarigi,</l>
.<l n="d">rurū kambaṅnyākiṅkiṅ unəṅiṅ saṅ garagati*.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. A. saniṅ garagata. B. saniṅ garagati. Z. 1.494: garagati ’spider or cater-pillar(?)’. The meaning is taken from KBW. He reads the entry from K.Y. as follows: (tañjuṅ) rurəū kəmbaṅnyākiṅkiṅ uneṅ i bəsarniṅ garagatī. Perhaps his doubts stem from this entry. I venture to see the word garagati or saṅ garagati as derived from gara (vife) and gati (intention, to go towards). So saṅ garagati should be rendered literally with those who want to rest with their wives. Hence my translation.</app> -->
4595</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="59" xml:id="krsnayana_01.60">
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.60.01" n="1">
4600<l n="a">ndātan varṇan kalaṅvanyaṅ upavana paran saṅ rva līlā miśāta,</l>
.<l n="b">taṅheh yan rūpakan rūmnya valuyana muvah kr̥ṣṇa lāvan sudevī,</l>
.<l n="c">ken sākṣāt arddha*-nareśvara patəmunirān sātmya paṅgih paḍāṅgəh,</l>
.<l n="d">saṅ** svāmyatyanta marmā marabi nr̥pasutā bhakti māsih majantən.</l>
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 117 ends here, followed by lontar 120.</app> -->
4605 <!-- <app>**B. A. si.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="60" xml:id="krsnayana_01.61">
.
4610<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.61.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">maṅgəh śrī parameśvarī paṅaran śrī rukmiṇī riṅ sarāt,</l>
.<l n="b">akveh putra narā[putri]kā* sapuluh putra paṅulvan rare,</l>
.<l n="c">pradyumna [carudeśna carudeha sucāru su]deśnākrama**,</l>
.<l n="d">sāmpunnyekā susena purvajanirān saṅ*** cāruguptān vijil. </l>
4615 <!-- <app>*S. AB. narā...kā.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. AB. pradyumna..desnākrama. </app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. A. nirādumaṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.61.02" n="2">
4620<l n="a">len saṅke si[raṅ]* cārudevaka kaparṇah de śaraṇyādulur,</l>
.<l n="b">kahyun-hyun sira cārucandra** matukar mvaṅ bhadracārvāsivo,</l>
.<l n="c">devī cāruvatī pamuṅsu jənək i ceṭī iñānusvani,</l>
.<l n="d">anvam susvane[nucap] *** tikaṅ sumarihe dlāhajə̄ṅ susvana.</l>
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. si...</app> -->
4625 <!-- <app>**S. AB. caruvinda.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***g AB. susvane...</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.61.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">len taṅ strī nr̥pa kr̥ṣṇa mukhya sapuluh hevvādhika laksana,</l>
4630<l n="b">kālindī pinakāgraniṅ kabinihajyan mitravindā vaneh,</l>
.<l n="c">satyā nagnājitā* sunandā paḍa tan sor jāmbavatyahajəṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">mvaṅ saṅ satrajitā kunaṅ kinasihan saṅ satyabhāmenucap. </l>
. <!-- <app>*S. Satya is nagnājitā. See Vishnu Purana, p. 457, note 1.</app> -->
.</lg>
4635</div>
.<div type="canto" n="61" xml:id="krsnayana_01.62">
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.62.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">dadi hyaṅ śrī strī nəmbəlas ivu muvah strī narapati,</l>
4640<l n="b">tuhun strī sāmānyāṅgəh ika sapanivyan sira kabeh,</l>
.<l n="c">inucap taṅ rāt svasthāṅ jagad i paṅadəg kr̥ṣṇa sinivi,</l>
.<l n="d">subhikṣa kṣemālvaṅ* vyasana sama ri** svarga saphala.</l>
. <!-- <app>c. B. tucap taṅ rāt.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>*S. AB. ksema rva.</app> -->
4645 <!-- <app>**S. AB. ni.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="62" xml:id="krsnayana_01.63">
.
4650<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.63.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">nāntuk mpu triguṇāṅraca[na katha]*,</l>
.<l n="b">[śrī] kr̥ṣṇa [nr̥paputri]kā** subhaga,</l>
.<l n="c">yāṅkən mantra japādi*** jaya-jaya,</l>
.<l n="d">nitya pr̥thana hayva saṅ ahulun.</l>
4655 <!-- <app>*S. AB. triguṇāṅraca... B. Lontar 120 ends here, followed by lontar 119</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**S. AB. ...kr̥ṣṇa...ka.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. A.japāda.,</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
4660<div type="canto" n="63" xml:id="krsnayana_01.64">
.
.<lg xml:id="krsnayana_01.64.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">śrī airlaṅghya mahāprabhāva ratu dibya ṅuni karəṅə̄,</l>
.<l n="b">tan lenādikavi mpu kaṇva marika saliṅsiṅan ira,</l>
4665<l n="c">maṅke śrī naranātha varṣajaya hantuseṅ kapirare,</l>
.<l n="d">kocap mpu triguṇādiniṅ kavi hinop saliṅsiṅan ira.</l>
. <!-- <app>b. saliṅsiṅan (preceptor, adviser etc): see Introduction.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
4670<!--Colophon A-->
.<div xml:id="krsnayana_01.65">
.<ab xml:id="krsnayana_01.65.01" type="colophon">
.1. yekin kr̥ṣṇāyana khyāti carita sinurat sāmpun iṅ bali nūsa,
.ṅkane tāmān ikaṅ śarmma subhaga vinuvus puṇya veśmātiśūnya,
4675yoṅgvan saṅ paṇḍitānāma rasika suranatha mpu siddhāntapakṣa,
.maṅgəh cihnākṣaranye likhita ya katəṅəran* subaddhan virūpa.
. <!-- <app>*B. A. kateṅetan.</app> --></ab>
.
.<ab xml:id="krsnayana_01.65.02" type="colophon">
46802. nāhan donyānulis dharmmasamaya rinasan syuhaniṅ mohabuddhi,
.saṅkeṅ cittekanaṅ pāpa vətunika kabeh prokṣakeṅ* jñāna śuddha,
.nirvyāpāreṅ manah kinkinən ulahani saṅ satvikā tan pramada,
.sāntən-sāntən pinə̄h taṅ rasa surasanikaṅ sarvaśāstre katə̄na**.
. <!-- <app>*B. A. poksakeṅ.</app> -->
4685 <!-- <app>**S. AB. katanā.</app> --></ab>
.
.<!--Colophon B-->
.<ab xml:id="krsnayana_01.65.03" type="colophon">1. rasa-rasa varṇa candrama mijil ri sāmpun ikanaṅ ārka māñjiṅ i daləm,
.kapatəhaṅ indriyāvas-avasən papāba ri hatinta lot gəsəṅana* .......,
4690......................................................................,
.......................................................................,
. <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 119 ends here.</app> --></ab>
.
.<ab xml:id="krsnayana_01.65.04" type="colophon">2. *1466. ri purṇamaniṅ** kapāt manəmu radite, yeka kottamanya, yan āṅilaṅ-akən ambək i mohanta***.
4695 <!-- <app>*B. Lontar 121 begins here.</app> -->
. <!-- <app>**B. A. ni. </app> -->
. <!-- <app>***B. Lontar 121 ends here.</app> --></ab>
.</div>
. </div>
4700 <div type="translation" source="bib:SoewitoSantoso1986_01" xml:id="krsnayana_02">
.
.<div type="canto" n="1" xml:id="krsnayana_02.01">
.<ab xml:id="krsnayana_02.01.01" corresp="#krsnayana_01.01.01">May there be no disturbances!</ab>
.<p xml:id="krsnayana_02.01.02" corresp="#krsnayana_01.01.02" n="1"> At the copper age Lord Wiṣṇu descended on earth as a human being. Nowhere else than in the parwas would the story be described as an act of one who imbibed [the knowledge]. It is believed that the opening hymn is capable to purify all the impurities of the listeners and to establish the mind of the poet to keep writing the book.</p>
4705<p xml:id="krsnayana_02.01.03" corresp="#krsnayana_01.01.03" n="2"> Then let me be given the hope to be able to increase the beauty by elaborating on the story, so that it can be likened to a sprout of the gaḍuṅ-plant‚ eagerly waiting for the drops of rain to fall. Then after a while of showers and aroused by thunder, it starts to grow a little and when it is fully grown, it will have many branches, leaves and flowers, giving rise to wonder [in the hearts] of those who see.</p>
.<p xml:id="krsnayana_02.01.04" corresp="#krsnayana_01.01.04" n="3"> However let me not be charmed too quickly by the [expectations] of such beauty, because there are yet a great deal to be done [to reveal] the beauty. It is like the bumble-bee, wondering through the bushes of asana-flowers while searching for honey, without regard to the cold and gusty wind or cowered by dew or burnt by the sun. Its only purpose that matters is to get the essence of the flowers and that is honey.</p>
.<p xml:id="krsnayana_02.01.05" corresp="#krsnayana_01.01.05" n="4"> Because the road to the mastering of the art of story-writing is difficult like scaling a mountain. The stress and strain [in connection with the writing] of a poem must be overcome and brought under control, because it is not a pleasure trip [through a garden of roses]. It is like scaling a mountain, hardship and tiredness have to be faced, in order to find satisfaction, as the result of leaning on a pen as on a walking-stick and wandering along the valleys of the writing-pad.</p>
.<p xml:id="krsnayana_02.01.06" corresp="#krsnayana_01.01.06" n="5"> Although [the life of] a poet is that hard, yet I do not want to leave it, because I want to meet the call of my heart. Also my adoration to Lord Wiṣṇu who had lead me to worship [him], by composing the story of Lord Krəṣṇa’s wedding to Princess Rukmiṇī. Perhaps the feeling is like this, which is felt by people of elevated souls.</p>
.</div>
4710<div type="canto" n="2" xml:id="krsnayana_02.02">
.
.
.<p xml:id="krsnayana_02.02.01" corresp="#krsnayana_01.02.01" n="1"> There was an extremely beautiful capital city, very well-planned which explained its intense beauty, known as the capital city of Dwārawatī. It was formerly a village located near the ocean, newly built into an excellent city, famous for its affluence and good life, well-established down to its gates. Furthermore, the reigning ruler was called Garuḍadhwaja (the bearer of the garuḍa-banner), known to the world as Lord Krəṣṇa.</p>
.
4715
.
.
.<p xml:id="krsnayana_02.02.02" corresp="#krsnayana_01.02.02" n="2"> However there was one impediment for the kingdom, in the form of the most powerful king of Yawana. The news was around that he had received a boon from God Rudra, that he would never be killed in battle by a member of the Yadu race. Therefore he [the king of Yawana] wanted to attack King Krəṣṇa forcefully, with his amazing host of demons, hundreds of thousands in number, together with vehicles and elephants.</p>
.
4720
.
.
.<p xml:id="krsnayana_02.02.03" corresp="#krsnayana_01.02.03" n="3"> Then he [King Krəsṇa] used his mastery of dharma (religious knowledge) and yoga (communion with the Supreme Deity) as defence against the enemy in the form of demons. He did not face the enemy in battle; instead he fled away, not because of fear, but because he had in mind an excellent strategy. He took his refuge with Priest Mucukunda, who was asleep in a cave on the slopes of the Himawān mountain. He hid himself under the couch of the great priest, looking for protection.</p>
.
4725
.
.
.<p xml:id="krsnayana_02.02.04" corresp="#krsnayana_01.02.04" n="4"> Not a minute later, the king of Yawana burst into the cave (of the mountain) in pursuit. He saw Priest Mucukunda, but his eyes and intellect were blinded into deceit. "Eey‚ son of Basudewa, you are deceitful, because you remain silent and do not utter a word. It is not allowed for a powerful hero to kill an opponent whilst he is asleep".</p>
.
4730
.
.
.<p xml:id="krsnayana_02.02.05" corresp="#krsnayana_01.02.05" n="5"> So he said, stepped forward and gave [the sleeping man] a kick. Let us relate the priest who was suddenly awakened. He was startled and looked very angry and fierce, his eyebrows moved creating furrows on his forehead, out of anger. From his eyes fire issued forth which turned into viṣānala (poisonous fire), flaring and flaming amazingly. It was exactly like the eyes of God Iśwara which issued fire to burn the god of love.</p>
.
4735
.
.
.<p xml:id="krsnayana_02.02.06" corresp="#krsnayana_01.02.06" n="6"> Roaring and flaring highly it enveloped King Kālayawana and set him ablaze together with his host and vehicles. They were annihilated, burnt to ashes without a single survival. Then King Krəṣṇa came out quickly to pay homage at the feet of the great priest, whose mind turned spotless clear once more. His anger disappeared like image in water.</p>
.
4740
.
.
.<p xml:id="krsnayana_02.02.07" corresp="#krsnayana_01.02.07" n="7"> They looked friendly, because they were happy to meet each other and conversing amiably; they came out of the cave. Let us leave them. After the conversation they bade each other farewell. The perfect sage returned to his contemplation in remembrance of God Śiwa. In short, he returned to the abode of the gods and ceased to be in a human form.</p>
.
4745<p xml:id="krsnayana_02.02.08" corresp="#krsnayana_01.02.08" n="8">On the other hand. King Krəṣṇa made his vay back to his country in a delightful journey. Women, jewels etc were captured and taken as booty from the city of Yawana. All the Yadu people were in glea and joy, because they found happiness in the bliss of their protector.</p>
.
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="3" xml:id="krsnayana_02.03">
.
4750
.<p xml:id="krsnayana_02.03.01" corresp="#krsnayana_01.03.01" n="1"> When King Krəṣṇa came back safe and sound, he planned to beautify his capital city. The region of Dwāravatī was once again purified with mantras, prayers and hymns, bad and auspicious times were taken into consideration by the great astrologers. The star [chosen] was Rohiṇī, signifying good [fortune] and victory. Thus was the verdict concerning the time [found in the scriptures].</p>
.
.
.
4755
.<p xml:id="krsnayana_02.03.02" corresp="#krsnayana_01.03.02" n="2"> Thus the purification ceremony of the capital city was performed to perfection, so that the whole kingdom of Dwārawatī became firmly secured. An excellent builder by the name of Wiśwakarmmā, an architect of the gods who was renowned in the art of carving, came.</p>
.
.
.
4760
.<p xml:id="krsnayana_02.03.03" corresp="#krsnayana_01.03.03" n="3"> Soon a beautiful palace for the king was built by Wiśwakarmmā, with great five aspects in all kinds of excellent finish. The audience hall, together with the royal square were already built strong and attractive. It was ten times better in style and refinement than before.</p>
.<p xml:id="krsnayana_02.03.04" corresp="#krsnayana_01.03.04" n="4"> Its only fault was that it [the royal square], was rather narrow and too close to the sea. Also the roaring and thundering sound of the breakers falling unto the rocks was loud beyond comparison. These were the reasons that God Baruṇa was summoned by King Krəṣṇa, to which he obliged very quickly. He did not object to withdraw the flow of the water of the sea [a bit further back].</p>
.
.
4765
.
.
.
.
4770<p xml:id="krsnayana_02.03.05" corresp="#krsnayana_01.03.05" n="5"> So the line of the coast was drawn back and the soil perfectly hardened and cleared. It became an appealing spot, because a busy market was founded there under the shades of bodhi, tangtang and banyan trees. A big river flowiṅ dangerously from the hills was perfectly dyked off [on both sides] with stones, increasing the boundaries of the palace compound. The area of the audience hall was nice and enthralling.</p>
.
.
.
.
4775<p xml:id="krsnayana_02.03.06" corresp="#krsnayana_01.03.06" n="6">The walls around the city were thick and strong; the inhabitants were harmonious in their propensities and the officials were staunchly judicious, e.g. Kaswa, Uddhawa, Wikaddha, Anadrəsya were always prudent and of excellent behaviour. Also the brahmins were paramount in the knowledge of the holy scriptures (Wedas) and highly dexterous in their expertise.
. </p>
.
.<p xml:id="krsnayana_02.03.07" corresp="#krsnayana_01.03.07" n="7"> So the administration buildings were always busy and emissaries from foreign countries were coming and going. The devout ministers as well as the religious clergy in the mountains were well-trained horsemen. There was no horse throughout the region of Dwārakā which was without walls, and all the wagons and horses had their own places.</p>
.
4780<p xml:id="krsnayana_02.03.08" corresp="#krsnayana_01.03.08" n="8">It was a pity that not all the subjects were contented: some were poor, because there were too many people. They made a representation at the feet of King Krəṣṇa asking for an increase of income, causing anxiety to the king. The Śaiwa and Buddhist priests made also a representation to the king with a report that they did not have enough means to live on, and so urging the king to give them more assistance.
. </p>
.
.<p xml:id="krsnayana_02.03.09" corresp="#krsnayana_01.03.09" n="9"> That was the reason that the god of wealth (Dhanādhipa) was summoned by King Krəṣṇa (Surendrānuja) and was ordered to shower wealth to give the people means to live. Jewels and precious stones then poured down from the sky, and the people throughout the kingdom were in delight and praised [the king] vehemently. Indeed it was the gift of the generous god of wealth (Weśrawaṇa) (who gave them the gold and silver).</p>
.
4785<p xml:id="krsnayana_02.03.10" corresp="#krsnayana_01.03.10" n="10"> There was an audience hall of the deities, famed to be the house of communion of the gods.
